Objectives.Description: Sip from a Cauldron of Vile Thoughts

quest_45019.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You know what you need? A drink from a Cauldron of Vile Thoughts. Alchemists can obtain the recipe from the undead. Find somebody willing to share their Cauldron, and sip! But be ready for anything.
quest_45019.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Good work! But I bet you can drink more!

quest_45020.Description: [This quest is just for gardeners. It requires Gardening 50 to grow a healthy pumpkin!] Zhia Lian: It's all well and good to find a pumpkin on a zombie, but I want really fresh pumpkins, so you should grow some for me. Find seedlings from undead and grow them in a garden.
quest_45020.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Grow Pumpkins
quest_45020.PrefaceText: [This quest is just for gardeners. It requires Gardening 50 to grow a healthy pumpkin!] Zhia Lian: It's all well and good to find a pumpkin on a zombie, but I want really fresh pumpkins, so you should grow some for me. Find seedlings from undead and grow them in a garden.
quest_45020.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Now those are fresh pumpkins! Hm, I guess I don't know why I wanted fresh pumpkins. Keep 'em.

quest_45021.Description: Zhia Lian: It takes a brave adventurer to even sip from a Cauldron of Vile Thoughts. And you're clearly brave! But the heartiest adventurers can GUZZLE from the Cauldron, yielding more dramatic results. Are you Guzzle-Level Brave?
quest_45021.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Guzzle from a Cauldron

Objectives.Description: Guzzle from a Cauldron of Vile Thoughts

quest_45021.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: It takes a brave adventurer to even sip from a Cauldron of Vile Thoughts. And you're clearly brave! But the heartiest adventurers can GUZZLE from the Cauldron, yielding more dramatic results. Are you Guzzle-Level Brave?
quest_45021.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Wow! Good work! Okay, enough drinking things.

quest_45022.Description: Zhia Lian: You've proven you're a skilled gardener AND a skilled cook. Now take on a tougher challenge: Pumpkin Spice Tea. You'll need to find the recipe from an undead!
quest_45022.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Pumpkin Spice Tea
quest_45022.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You've proven you're a skilled gardener AND a skilled cook. Now take on a tougher challenge: Pumpkin Spice Tea. You'll need to find the recipe from an undead!
quest_45022.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Mm, savor that aroma! Good work.

quest_45023.Description: Zhia Lian: You know what would go great with wings and a hideous face? A stylish hat! Bring me some supplies and I'll teach you the recipe so you can make your own. Fashionable! [Note: it requires Tailoring 30 to make a hat for a bat! But even if you don't have enough tailoring skill yet, you can still complete this quest to learn the recipe for future use.]
quest_45023.Name: Zhia Lian Event: A Hat Fit for a Bat
quest_45023.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You know what would go great with wings and a hideous face? A stylish hat! Bring me some supplies and I'll teach you the recipe so you can make your own. Fashionable! [Note: it requires Tailoring 30 to make a hat for a bat! But even if you don't have enough tailoring skill yet, you can still complete this quest to learn the recipe for future use.]
quest_45023.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Here you go! Sew your stylish bat hat and wear it with pride! Just remember that you look absolutely ridiculous.

quest_45024.Description: Zhia Lian: Ghouls are nasty, disgusting undead. There is nothing more gross than a pile of dead ghouls. At least skeletons don't smell very much! Go make the world a better-smelling place! Bury all the ghouls you can find!
quest_45024.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Bury Ghouls
quest_45024.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Ghouls are nasty, disgusting undead. There is nothing more gross than a pile of dead ghouls. At least skeletons don't smell very much! Go make the world a better-smelling place! Bury all the ghouls you can find!
quest_45024.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Good. I hate ghouls. So gross.

quest_45025.Description: [This quest is just for gardeners. It requires Gardening 15 to grow an evil pumpkin!] Zhia Lian: You can never have enough exploding pumpkins! Well, I can't. Take the seeds from the evil pumpkins and grow me some evil fruit! Pumpkin is a fruit, right? Well, whatever. Just grow them already!
quest_45025.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Grow Evil Pumpkins
quest_45025.PrefaceText: [This quest is just for gardeners. It requires Gardening 15 to grow an evil pumpkin!] Zhia Lian: You can never have enough exploding pumpkins! Well, I can't. Take the seeds from the evil pumpkins and grow me some evil fruit! Pumpkin is a fruit, right? Well, whatever. Just grow them already!
quest_45025.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Eh. I'm kind of sick of pumpkins. You keep them.

quest_45026.Description: Zhia Lian: You know what makes a great warm meal during the autumn months? Pumpkin soup! ... But I'm not sure I believe that. Here's the recipe, if you don't already know it. Now make me some soup!
quest_45026.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Pumpkin Soup
quest_45026.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You know what makes a great warm meal during the autumn months? Pumpkin soup! ... But I'm not sure I believe that. Here's the recipe, if you don't already know it. Now make me some soup!
quest_45026.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: You did it! And it smells just as weird as I figured it would. Well, there's a nice hearty meal for you! I hope you like it better than I do.

quest_45027.Description: Zhia Lian: You know what else makes a great warm meal during the autumn months? It's not pumpkin salad! But it makes a refreshing cold meal, so there's that. I'll share the recipe with you if you make one for me.
quest_45027.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Pumpkin Salad
quest_45027.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You know what else makes a great warm meal during the autumn months? It's not pumpkin salad! But it makes a refreshing cold meal, so there's that. I'll share the recipe with you if you make one for me.
quest_45027.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Hey, not bad! No, no, you keep it. I filled up on candy.

quest_45028.Description: Zhia Lian: Hey, I detect interference from my old friend Akhisa in the Serbule Crypt! Find the talking spider and set it free, then convince it to make you into a spider. It'll be fun! Trust me! You still have those allies handy from killing Ursula, right? Hmm, actually, you might need some better friends... Oh hey. When you talk to the spider, remember to buy his special powers! [You must defeat dangerous Elite creatures to complete this quest. Recommended for a group of 5+ level 25 players.]
quest_45028.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Become a Spider

Objectives.Description: Become a spider and use Spider Bite

quest_45028.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Hey, I detect interference from my old friend Akhisa in the Serbule Crypt! Find the talking spider and set it free, then convince it to make you into a spider. It'll be fun! Trust me! You still have those allies handy from killing Ursula, right? Hmm, actually, you might need some better friends... Oh hey. When you talk to the spider, remember to buy his special powers! [You must defeat dangerous Elite creatures to complete this quest. Recommended for a group of 5+ level 25 players.]
quest_45028.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: See? See?! Isn't having eight legs great? But a word of caution: you CAN go too far. Once I turned into a 48-legged spider, and that's too much. Stick with eight, it's easier to manage. You look great, by the way!

quest_45029.Description: Zhia Lian: Hey spider-buddy, why don't you try out your new body? It has sooo many disgusting powers. First, go fill tigers with your babies!
quest_45029.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Fill Tigers With Your Babies

Objectives.Description: As a spider, use Incubate on Tigers

quest_45029.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Hey spider-buddy, why don't you try out your new body? It has sooo many disgusting powers. First, go fill tigers with your babies!
quest_45029.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Sooo gross! Having a living thing growing inside of you is so disgusting! Let's move on to something less horrible.

quest_45030.Description: Zhia Lian: Did I say 'less horrible'? I misspoke. Spiders can spit their digestive fluids as an attack! Now THAT is horrible! So go do it! Do it to goblins. They're probably the funniest when they melt!
quest_45030.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Spit on Goblins

Objectives.Description: As a spider, Spit Acid on Goblins

quest_45030.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Did I say 'less horrible'? I misspoke. Spiders can spit their digestive fluids as an attack! Now THAT is horrible! So go do it! Do it to goblins. They're probably the funniest when they melt!
quest_45030.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: That wasn't funny at all! It was just gross. What a disappointment. Let's do something less cruel and disgusting next!

quest_45031.Description: Zhia Lian: The undead are extra active right now, so you need to slay them! Start by killing skeletons. You can find them in a graveyard. Or lots of other places, really. Oh, and if you're freaked out about murder, don't worry: it doesn't count as murder when you kill the undead! You can trust me. I'm a god.
quest_45031.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Skeletons

Objectives.Description: Loot a bone from a skeleton

quest_45031.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Excellent work! Now maybe you're ready for some tougher undead.

quest_45032.Description: Zhia Lian: Ghosts are at their scariest in the wee hours. So prove your mettle by killing them at night!
quest_45032.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Ghosts at Night
quest_45032.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Ghosts are at their scariest in the wee hours. So prove your mettle by killing them at night!
quest_45032.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: You weren't even scared at all! Not very fun to watch! But hey, good work and all that.

quest_45033.Description: Zhia Lian: You should definitely kill some zombies. Let me look... I see some zombies in a cave in Serbule. There's lots of ... walking brain monsters. Weird. Oh! I found a bigger collection of them. They're in a dungeon underneath a tower in Kur. Go go go!
quest_45033.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Zombies

Objectives.Description: Loot a zombified hand from a zombie

quest_45033.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You should definitely kill some zombies. Let me look... I see some zombies in a cave in Serbule. There's lots of ... walking brain monsters. Weird. Oh! I found a bigger collection of them. They're in a dungeon underneath a tower in Kur. Go go go!
quest_45033.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Good work. You did a perfectly functional job of killing zombies. Yawn Let's move on to more interesting undead!

quest_45034.Description: Zhia Lian: You've faced ghosts, but can you face the most dangerous ghost in Serbule... Lord Serbule himself?! Get your friends. Lord Serbule has grown strong from his sorrow. I'm not sure where he's hiding right now, but I do remember overhearing this: "Instead of a femur, offer a skull." I dunno what it means. Figure it out and kill him! [Lord Serbule is an encounter for a group of 6 players with level 30-40 combat skills.]
quest_45034.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Lord Serbule
quest_45034.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You've faced ghosts, but can you face the most dangerous ghost in Serbule... Lord Serbule himself?! Get your friends. Lord Serbule has grown strong from his sorrow. I'm not sure where he's hiding right now, but I do remember overhearing this: "Instead of a femur, offer a skull." I dunno what it means. Figure it out and kill him! [Lord Serbule is an encounter for a group of 6 players with level 30-40 combat skills.]
quest_45034.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Good job. I bet Lord Serbule will be sent back here as soon as Ilth notices he's returned to Chalice, but you bought us some time. And that's all mortality is anyway: borrowed time! So let's move on.

quest_45035.Description: Zhia Lian: Ghouls are rarer undead. Urtigal used to make tons of them, but he's dead now. So I don't know who keeps making new ones... but anyway, you should kill them! Let's see... you can find some deep in the dungeon beneath the ruined Kur Tower. And you might want to bring a friend or two: it looks pretty dangerous in there!
quest_45035.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Ghouls
quest_45035.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Ghouls are rarer undead. Urtigal used to make tons of them, but he's dead now. So I don't know who keeps making new ones... but anyway, you should kill them! Let's see... you can find some deep in the dungeon beneath the ruined Kur Tower. And you might want to bring a friend or two: it looks pretty dangerous in there!
quest_45035.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Good. I hate ghouls. So gross.

quest_45036.Description: Zhia Lian: There's a tomb near you called Borghild. I happen to know that it's home to some terrifying Faces of Death. You should gather your fellow heroes or whatever, then go destroy them! [Borghild is recommended for a group of 3+ level 30-40 players. You can also find Faces of Death in a few other locations -- those count too!]
quest_45036.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Faces of Death
quest_45036.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: There's a tomb near you called Borghild. I happen to know that it's home to some terrifying Faces of Death. You should gather your fellow heroes or whatever, then go destroy them! [Borghild is recommended for a group of 3+ level 30-40 players. You can also find Faces of Death in a few other locations -- those count too!]

quest_45037.Description: Zhia Lian: Oh, hey, I just remembered something! There's this toady little necromancer named Mort. He's always been a favorite of Harukita. Last year, some heroes managed to trap him in a pocket dimension, then put the dimension in a magic jar and bury it in a cave! But Harukita just caused it to mysteriously reappear. It's just lying in the snow in Kur. Look for a campfire near a stream, close to an orc settlement. And listen: Mort's technically alive, so killing him is murder. BUT! He was dead, and UN-dead, off and on, for like fifty years before he made some kind of pact with Harukita. So don't sweat the murder thing. He's evil. [Mortimer is an encounter for a group of players with level 50 combat skills.]
quest_45037.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Mortimer
quest_45037.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Oh, hey, I just remembered something! There's this toady little necromancer named Mort. He's always been a favorite of Harukita. Last year, some heroes managed to trap him in a pocket dimension, then put the dimension in a magic jar and bury it in a cave! But Harukita just caused it to mysteriously reappear. It's just lying in the snow in Kur. Look for a campfire near a stream, close to an orc settlement. And listen: Mort's technically alive, so killing him is murder. BUT! He was dead, and UN-dead, off and on, for like fifty years before he made some kind of pact with Harukita. So don't sweat the murder thing. He's evil. [Mortimer is an encounter for a group of players with level 50 combat skills.]
quest_45037.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Mort's dead! Although realistically... he'll probably be alive again within a year. But at least he's not roaming free! You bought the orcs of Kur another year of life! That's worth something!

quest_45038.Description: Zhia Lian: Mummies are another rare undead, because that quitter Ormorek refuses to make new ones. But there's still plenty left for you to kill, don't worry. Most mortals are terrified of them because they spread horrific diseases. But you aren't afraid, are you? Prove it by catching a mummy disease, then killing the fiends! [You can find mummies in a cave in Gazluk.]
quest_45038.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Mummies

Objectives.Description: Kill mummies while suffering from a mummy disease

quest_45038.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Mummies are another rare undead, because that quitter Ormorek refuses to make new ones. But there's still plenty left for you to kill, don't worry. Most mortals are terrified of them because they spread horrific diseases. But you aren't afraid, are you? Prove it by catching a mummy disease, then killing the fiends! [You can find mummies in a cave in Gazluk.]
quest_45038.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Good work! And here's a cure for that disease.

quest_45039.Description: Zhia Lian: Okay this one is a personal favor to me. There's this yeti-infested cave in Kur Mountains where a particularly... problematic... ghoul named Maligno lives. He fancies himself a powerful undead. Show him that he's not! [The yeti cave is a soloable dungeon recommened for players with level 40+ combat skills.]
quest_45039.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Maligno
quest_45039.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Okay this one is a personal favor to me. There's this yeti-infested cave in Kur Mountains where a particularly... problematic... ghoul named Maligno lives. He fancies himself a powerful undead. Show him that he's not! [The yeti cave is a soloable dungeon recommened for players with level 40+ combat skills.]
quest_45039.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: You showed Maligno who's boss! That traitor! Now let's move on to even more serious threats.

quest_45040.Description: Zhia Lian: I heard Ilth Hale say that one of her favorite minions, Empusa, is hiding in Rahu, waiting to strike. You should get some friends and kill Empusa before it's too late! I'm not sure where she's hiding, but I remember something Ilth Hale said: "Quoth the Ravens, Nevermore". Maybe it's a pass-phrase or something. [Empusa is an encounter for a group of 5 players with level 60 combat skills.]
quest_45040.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Empusa
quest_45040.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: I heard Ilth Hale say that one of her favorite minions, Empusa, is hiding in Rahu, waiting to strike. You should get some friends and kill Empusa before it's too late! I'm not sure where she's hiding, but I remember something Ilth Hale said: "Quoth the Ravens, Nevermore". Maybe it's a pass-phrase or something. [Empusa is an encounter for a group of 5 players with level 60 combat skills.]
quest_45040.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Oh, good! I was pretty sure that Empusa was way, WAY more powerful than you. But I'm glad I was wrong!

quest_45041.Description: Zhia Lian: You know how Kajich hates Tast? Because of the... nevermind. Not important. Anyway, listen: there's a very dangerous semi-undead hag underneath an orcish city called Gazluk Keep. She's sleeping in a coffin inside a hidden room. That should be easy enough to find, right? Get a bunch of friends, and find this hag before she awakens and takes over the whole keep! [Gazluk Keep is a dungeon for a group of 5 players with level 70 combat skills.]
quest_45041.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Anhinda
quest_45041.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You know how Kajich hates Tast? Because of the... nevermind. Not important. Anyway, listen: there's a very dangerous semi-undead hag underneath an orcish city called Gazluk Keep. She's sleeping in a coffin inside a hidden room. That should be easy enough to find, right? Get a bunch of friends, and find this hag before she awakens and takes over the whole keep! [Gazluk Keep is a dungeon for a group of 5 players with level 70 combat skills.]
quest_45041.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: You killed Anhinda? Now that IS impressive! Nice going!

quest_45042.Description: Zhia Lian: Okay, just asking you to fight "skeletons" was obviously silly. I should have specified: skeleton mages! The scary ones with the magic staves. Kill those.
quest_45042.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Skeleton Mages
quest_45042.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Okay, just asking you to fight "skeletons" was obviously silly. I should have specified: skeleton mages! The scary ones with the magic staves. Kill those.
quest_45042.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Okay, that's not bad! But... still not really impressive. Hmm... I've got it!

quest_45043.Description: Zhia Lian: I heard there's some kind of powerful haunting-skeleton in the Serbule Crypt. You should go kill it. I think it's called 'Ursula'. Oh, and you should bring some friends for this party, because Ursula has backup! [Ursula is a dangerous boss monster. Recommended for a group of 3+ level 15 players.]
quest_45043.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Ursula
quest_45043.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: I heard there's some kind of powerful haunting-skeleton in the Serbule Crypt. You should go kill it. I think it's called 'Ursula'. Oh, and you should bring some friends for this party, because Ursula has backup! [Ursula is a dangerous boss monster. Recommended for a group of 3+ level 15 players.]
quest_45043.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: You killed Ursula too, just like that? Well, I guess you really can kill skeletons, huh? Okay! Let's move on to bigger prey!

quest_45044.Description: Zhia Lian: Okay this is another personal favor to me. This one's not even on the same mortal plane as you, but I just... I really hate him. He's such a dick! There's this skeleton that got himself powered up with fairy magic. He lives in a junction between the fae realm and your realm. He's called the Bonfire Puck. You should kill him! Oh, let me help you find him. It looks like there's an entrance from a little island called "Sun Vale." You'll probably need some backup. [The Winter Nexus is recommended for a group of 3+ players with level 50 combat skills.]
quest_45044.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill the Bonfire Puck
quest_45044.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Okay this is another personal favor to me. This one's not even on the same mortal plane as you, but I just... I really hate him. He's such a dick! There's this skeleton that got himself powered up with fairy magic. He lives in a junction between the fae realm and your realm. He's called the Bonfire Puck. You should kill him! Oh, let me help you find him. It looks like there's an entrance from a little island called "Sun Vale." You'll probably need some backup. [The Winter Nexus is recommended for a group of 3+ players with level 50 combat skills.]
quest_45044.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Oh good! That jerk really made me look bad. I did ONE little favor for him by giving him free will. I hoped he'd become a funny skeleton juggler or something. But he immediately ran off and joined the fairies in a scheme to freeze our world in ice! That dick! Ilth Hale never stopped making fun of me about it. Thanks for taking care of the problem.

quest_45045.Description: Zhia Lian: Great, you're definitely competent! That means you can help with a slightly awkward problem: a few thousand years ago, long before he died, Urtigal taught me how to make undead. And the first monsters I made were silly undead that can haunt plants. They're really tacky. I was just messing around! Anyway, a bunch have escaped Chalice and they're infesting a pumpkin patch in Serbule Hills. Kill them before they do something that embarrasses me!
quest_45045.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Pumpkin Mimics
quest_45045.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Great, you're definitely competent! That means you can help with a slightly awkward problem: a few thousand years ago, long before he died, Urtigal taught me how to make undead. And the first monsters I made were silly undead that can haunt plants. They're really tacky. I was just messing around! Anyway, a bunch have escaped Chalice and they're infesting a pumpkin patch in Serbule Hills. Kill them before they do something that embarrasses me!
quest_45045.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: I think you killed enough of the little jerks to keep them from invading a town or anything else too drastic. The stragglers will probably eat a few people, but meh. Hey, wanna see something funny? If you grow the seeds from those evil pumpkins, they explode! But fair warning: it hasn't been a very popular party trick for me.

quest_45046.Description: Zhia Lian: It's deathbat breeding season! Oh, you mortals call them flapskulls. That nickname makes Kajich so angry! They were supposed to be scary! But your nickname ruined it and he abandoned them. So I fixed up his creation: I gave them the ability to breed. It was a good idea given the situation at the time, I promise! But less good now. Anyway, they're showing up at night near a small lake in the Ilmari desert. They don't come out during the day, so you'll have to pull an all-nighter for this one.
quest_45046.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Flapskulls in the Ilmari Desert

Objectives.Description: Kill Flapskulls in the Ilmari Desert

quest_45046.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: It's deathbat breeding season! Oh, you mortals call them flapskulls. That nickname makes Kajich so angry! They were supposed to be scary! But your nickname ruined it and he abandoned them. So I fixed up his creation: I gave them the ability to breed. It was a good idea given the situation at the time, I promise! But less good now. Anyway, they're showing up at night near a small lake in the Ilmari desert. They don't come out during the day, so you'll have to pull an all-nighter for this one.
quest_45046.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Good job taking them out before they bred! Because it turns out you CAN have too many flapskulls, as we learned in Chalice.

quest_45047.Description: Zhia Lian: That idiot Harukita sent undead through the fae realm portal! He thinks he can gain a foothold there while the fairy courts are fighting. But he sent them to a plane controlled by Agrashab! And we all know what happens when Aggy gets Angry! You need to clear those undead out of there before Agrashab notices and launches a war on our world! The skeletons will be hiding until nighttime, then they'll try to blend in among other monsters in the area. But since there's not supposed to be ANY skeletons in the fae realm, they should stand out!
quest_45047.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Skeletons in the Fae Realm
quest_45047.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: That idiot Harukita sent undead through the fae realm portal! He thinks he can gain a foothold there while the fairy courts are fighting. But he sent them to a plane controlled by Agrashab! And we all know what happens when Aggy gets Angry! You need to clear those undead out of there before Agrashab notices and launches a war on our world! The skeletons will be hiding until nighttime, then they'll try to blend in among other monsters in the area. But since there's not supposed to be ANY skeletons in the fae realm, they should stand out!
quest_45047.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Well... we're not under attack by a vengeful Fae god... so far. A decent night's work, I'd say!

quest_45048.Description: Zhia Lian: It looks like Norala is up to something. You know, the goddess of the Hunt? She created werewolves? Anyway, she's mobilizing them to attack someone. You'd better go and make your presence known before she starts a war. Wars are boring.
quest_45048.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Werewolves in Kur
quest_45048.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: It looks like Norala is up to something. You know, the goddess of the Hunt? She created werewolves? Anyway, she's mobilizing them to attack someone. You'd better go and make your presence known before she starts a war. Wars are boring.
quest_45048.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Nice job killing werewolves. That's really the only thing that Norala respects these days: killing power. Now that Norala knows she isn't the only god making a play during this weird equinox thing, she'll be more careful, more manipulative, and way less boring. So good work!

quest_45049.Description: Zhia Lian: Next, you'd better go save Rahu from an uprising of undead. There's a bunch of necromancers deep in the sewers, and they're planning an invasion.
quest_45049.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Ratkin Necromancers in the Rahu Sewer

Objectives.Description: Kill Ratkin Necromancers in Rahu Sewers

quest_45049.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Next, you'd better go save Rahu from an uprising of undead. There's a bunch of necromancers deep in the sewers, and they're planning an invasion.
quest_45049.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Good job with the necromancers. There's nothing I hate more than a trite invasion plan. And really, "armies rising from the sewers" is more of a Gulagra thing. Undead should be a little classier than that!

quest_45050.Description: Zhia Lian: I can't tell you why, but you should go kill Barghests. Okay you twisted my arm. The reason is Norala, goddess of Hunting. She's trying to take control of them and turn them into a new kind of werewolf! Dreva would normally stop her, but Dreva is busy right now. So you go do it!
quest_45050.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Barghests in Gazluk
quest_45050.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: I can't tell you why, but you should go kill Barghests. Okay you twisted my arm. The reason is Norala, goddess of Hunting. She's trying to take control of them and turn them into a new kind of werewolf! Dreva would normally stop her, but Dreva is busy right now. So you go do it!
quest_45050.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Look, I'm sorry I made you kill murderpuppies. I know they seemed harmless, but I swear that they were about to get mind-controlled by Norala! Well, that's a rumor I heard, anyway... and you put a stop to it!

quest_45051.Description: Zhia Lian: There's lots of other dangerous undead out there. Take your little war band and go find them! [Undead of any type or level will work, as long as they are Elite. Elite undead typically require a group of 3+ players.]
quest_45051.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Elite Undead
quest_45051.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: There's lots of other dangerous undead out there. Take your little war band and go find them! [Undead of any type or level will work, as long as they are Elite. Elite undead typically require a group of 3+ players.]
quest_45051.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Good work. See, this is why I think that letting necromancers live was a mistake. Whenever a mortal necromancer dies, their undead creations can break free, and eventually some become super powerful. If all necromancers were liches, we wouldn't have that problem! But no, we can't change the nature of necromancy because Harukita says "life is a precious source of hatred." So how about just granting living necromancers eternal life? Nope: Kajich says all living things must fear the grave. So here we are, mopping up small problems instead of dealing with the fundamental issues.

quest_45052.Description: Zhia Lian: I just had a good idea. You should learn necromancy! It will help you understand what we're fighting! There's an old-fashioned altar to Harukita deep in the Serbule Crypt. Go pledge yourself to Harukita and we'll have some fun. [Reaching the altar requires a group of 3+ level 30 players.]
quest_45052.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Become a Necromancer

Objectives.Description: Become a necromancer and raise a skeleton.

quest_45052.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: I just had a good idea. You should learn necromancy! It will help you understand what we're fighting! There's an old-fashioned altar to Harukita deep in the Serbule Crypt. Go pledge yourself to Harukita and we'll have some fun. [Reaching the altar requires a group of 3+ level 30 players.]
quest_45052.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Those old illegal Harukita altars are great: they just dump knowledge right into your brain, no learning required, and no sacrifices needed either! But did you notice that your hatred has become fuzzier and less specific? You're gonna have to hate more explicitly from now on, because Harukita is tapping your subconscious emotions to power himself. Oh, come on, it's no big deal. In time you'll learn to hate again. Most necromancers eventually become incredible assholes, so don't worry about it! Let's go have some necrofun!

quest_45053.Description: Zhia Lian: Most necromancers are loners. Which is sad, because the most amusing way to use necromancy is in large groups! Get a group together and murder dangerous creatures! [Killing any Elite over level 20 will count toward the completion of this quest so long as you have Necromancy active.]
quest_45053.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Elites as a Necromancer
quest_45053.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Most necromancers are loners. Which is sad, because the most amusing way to use necromancy is in large groups! Get a group together and murder dangerous creatures! [Killing any Elite over level 20 will count toward the completion of this quest so long as you have Necromancy active.]
quest_45053.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Watching you, I think I see why most necromancers are loners: the smell of corpses is pretty offputting. But I have a fix for that! Here. You should dab a bit of that on. Now let's go, we have more things to do tonight!

quest_45054.Description: Zhia Lian: The ratkin necromancers underneath Rahu have been breeding high-quality necro rats. Very cute! They can act as your sidekick, helping you focus necromantic energy. Go find one and fight with it!
quest_45054.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill With Your Necro Rat

Objectives.Description: Kill With a Pet Necro Rat

quest_45054.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: The ratkin necromancers underneath Rahu have been breeding high-quality necro rats. Very cute! They can act as your sidekick, helping you focus necromantic energy. Go find one and fight with it!
quest_45054.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Hrm. Well, they're cute, but as far as sidekicks go, those rats don't seem very evil. They're just animals! I don't think the other Chalice gods would be excited about them. Let's move on.

quest_45055.Description: Zhia Lian: One of the most amusing things a necromancer can do is talk to corpses. Go try it! I think there's someone in nearby Eltibule that can teach you. Look for a goblin that doesn't attack on sight -- that'll be him.
quest_45055.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Talk To Corpses
quest_45055.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: One of the most amusing things a necromancer can do is talk to corpses. Go try it! I think there's someone in nearby Eltibule that can teach you. Look for a goblin that doesn't attack on sight -- that'll be him.
quest_45055.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: On second thought, corpses are boring conversationalists. They never have anything new to say; they just talk about their lives and how they died and blah blah blah. Let's move on.

quest_45056.Description: Zhia Lian: You should get some practice terrifying mortals. It will help you understand how to survive a meeting with Kajich, the god of Fear. [Any Fear ability will advance this quest, if used on a sentient opponent.]
quest_45056.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Strike Terror!

Objectives.Description: Use fear on different sentient enemies

quest_45056.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You should get some practice terrifying mortals. It will help you understand how to survive a meeting with Kajich, the god of Fear. [Any Fear ability will advance this quest, if used on a sentient opponent.]
quest_45056.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: I'm sure that gave you some insights into fear! But if you ever have to face Kajich, don't be complacent: Kajich is literally the scariest thing you can imagine. Okay time for some more training! This is going well!

quest_45057.Description: Zhia Lian: You know my favorite instrument? It's those high-pitched tambourines that ratkin use. Let's collect some. I have an idea!
quest_45057.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Ratkin Tambourines
quest_45057.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You know my favorite instrument? It's those high-pitched tambourines that ratkin use. Let's collect some. I have an idea!
quest_45057.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: No, nevermind, these sound terrible. What are we doing, messing around like this? There's important work to do!

quest_45058.Description: Zhia Lian: You're going up against Kajich's undead incarnations of fear. You need training. Let's do scary things! Drowning is scary, right? Hmm... Go kill things while fully submerged in water. That will be nice and scary.
quest_45058.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill While Submerged
quest_45058.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You're going up against Kajich's undead incarnations of fear. You need training. Let's do scary things! Drowning is scary, right? Hmm... Go kill things while fully submerged in water. That will be nice and scary.
quest_45058.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: That seemed like it'd be scarier. In my head, I mean. Well, let's move on to scarier things!

quest_45059.Description: Zhia Lian: Ugh, undeath is creeping into the sea, too. There are undead starfish in the reefs! They burn you when you touch them. So fun! But evil. Very evil. So go get rid of those before mortals get hurt!
quest_45059.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Creepy Starfish

Objectives.Description: Collect Creepy Starfish in Sun Vale

quest_45059.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Ugh, undeath is creeping into the sea, too. There are undead starfish in the reefs! They burn you when you touch them. So fun! But evil. Very evil. So go get rid of those before mortals get hurt!
quest_45059.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: See, now aren't you happy you practiced holding your breath earlier? Those starfish were pretty deep! All my plans work out eventually. And when they work out, you win! We're simpatico, you and me: I give you jobs and you do the jobs! This mind-invasion is working out so much better than usual!

quest_45060.Description: Zhia Lian: You know what we don't see enough of? Dancing skeletons! If you're ever a skeleton, would you dance for me?
quest_45060.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Skeleton Dance?
quest_45060.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You know what we don't see enough of? Dancing skeletons! If you're ever a skeleton, would you dance for me?
quest_45060.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Hah, your arms are so WRONG when you do that! I loved your stupid little dance. Thank-you for performing it for me.

quest_45061.Description: Zhia Lian: You've been so helpful that I want to repay you with an amazing party! You just need to help get things prepared. Okay, actually this one might be a bit involved... see, it's a cult party. For my cult. Oh, it's fine, don't worry, it's not a murderous cult. It's a party cult! Or at least it will be. Now you have to promise not to say ONE WORD about how I'm talking into your head. Got it? As far as most people know, Zhia Lian does not like to talk directly into peoples' minds. It's extra work for me, and I'm sure as hell not gonna bother for people like these cultists. Don't make my life harder! If people ask why you're helping me, tell them I met you in person and you owe me a favor. Make up whatever details you want! Maybe we were arm wrestling and you lost. I really don't care. Anyway: there's a human named Brandon who needs help making the big party happen. He's in a hamlet in the Ilmari desert. Go help him!
quest_45061.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Preparing For The Big Party
quest_45061.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You've been so helpful that I want to repay you with an amazing party! You just need to help get things prepared. Okay, actually this one might be a bit involved... see, it's a cult party. For my cult. Oh, it's fine, don't worry, it's not a murderous cult. It's a party cult! Or at least it will be. Now you have to promise not to say ONE WORD about how I'm talking into your head. Got it? As far as most people know, Zhia Lian does not like to talk directly into peoples' minds. It's extra work for me, and I'm sure as hell not gonna bother for people like these cultists. Don't make my life harder! If people ask why you're helping me, tell them I met you in person and you owe me a favor. Make up whatever details you want! Maybe we were arm wrestling and you lost. I really don't care. Anyway: there's a human named Brandon who needs help making the big party happen. He's in a hamlet in the Ilmari desert. Go help him!
quest_45061.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Great work. The party is moving forward and I made sure you're on the guest list! Oh, hey, since only cult members can get into the party, and you're on the guest list, that means you must be in my cult now! Congratulations! Remember: you'll need a mask to get into the party, since it's a masquerade. But I'm sure you can find one somewhere.

quest_45062.Description: Zhia Lian: So did Brandon tell you about his friends that made stupid decisions with their lives and then suffered ENTIRELY REASONABLE consequences? Good! Because I stupidly promised I'd fix them for the big party. The thing is, I don't want to perform miracles at my cultists' party. It sends the wrong message, you know? This is a party, not a wishing club! So I was thinking, maybe you could get them all fixed up BEFORE the party. Don't worry, this is going to work out great for you. I'll do the heavy lifting and you'll get all the glory! This all needs to seem like your idea, so go talk to Brandon at the party site and ask him about the cultists. Then go talk to them and help 'em out.
quest_45062.Name: Zhia Lian Event: The Unfortunate Cultists
quest_45062.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: So did Brandon tell you about his friends that made stupid decisions with their lives and then suffered ENTIRELY REASONABLE consequences? Good! Because I stupidly promised I'd fix them for the big party. The thing is, I don't want to perform miracles at my cultists' party. It sends the wrong message, you know? This is a party, not a wishing club! So I was thinking, maybe you could get them all fixed up BEFORE the party. Don't worry, this is going to work out great for you. I'll do the heavy lifting and you'll get all the glory! This all needs to seem like your idea, so go talk to Brandon at the party site and ask him about the cultists. Then go talk to them and help 'em out.
quest_45062.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Cultists all happy now? Great. It took a long time to plant those cures where they'd find them! The donkey potion was especially hard: I had to subtly alter the laws of nature to make it work, which means I'll probably be hearing from Dreva soon. But the important thing is my cultists think they were cured by a string of lucky breaks, not godly miracles. And you did a bit of work too. We make a great team! I have to admit that I was in a really bad mood the day I granted those wishes. Ormorek had just been telling me about his stupid dream-soldiers and how I never do anything to help mortals, and blah blah blah. Don't tell me what to do! Not that you do. That's why I like you. Also you're incredibly powerful for a mortal. Anyway, here: this is for you, loyal cultist!

quest_45063.Description:
Brianna Willer in Serbule Hills said, "My entire pumpkin patch is infested with evil monsters! I've never seen anything like 'em! Luckily I'd already harvested half the pumpkins, but the remaining ones are rotted inside. Even the seeds inside them are bad!

And now I'm worried they're gonna wander off and hurt somebody that can't take care of themselves, like the Duchess. Tell you what: kill 'em off and I'll give you some of my earlier pumpkin harvest."
quest_45063.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Brianna's Pumpkins
quest_45063.PrefaceText:
My entire pumpkin patch is infested with evil monsters! I've never seen anything like 'em! Luckily I'd already harvested half the pumpkins, but the remaining ones are rotted inside. Even the seeds inside them are bad!

And now I'm worried they're gonna wander off and hurt somebody that can't take care of themselves, like the Duchess. Tell you what: kill 'em off and I'll give you some of my earlier pumpkin harvest.
quest_45063.SuccessText: Thanks. Here's some edible pumpkins for ya. I swear, this neighborhood just gets worse and worse. First the ranalon and now this! Pah.

quest_45064.Description: Zhia Lian: Even Tuvillus is using this opportunity to invade your world. He's the god of Jealousy and Envy, and he's creating massive jealousy-pumps in hidden places. They'll look like giant floating hearts! Gather an army... or at least a posse... and hunt the hearts! I'll lead you to each one! The first giant heart is in Eltibule, beneath the little keep there.
quest_45064.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill the First Evil Heart
quest_45064.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Even Tuvillus is using this opportunity to invade your world. He's the god of Jealousy and Envy, and he's creating massive jealousy-pumps in hidden places. They'll look like giant floating hearts! Gather an army... or at least a posse... and hunt the hearts! I'll lead you to each one! The first giant heart is in Eltibule, beneath the little keep there.
quest_45064.SuccessText: One heart down! Lots to go!

quest_45065.Description: Zhia Lian: The second giant heart thing is in Kur. I see a ruined tower, and underneath it is a necromancer. He's got minions guarding the heart.
quest_45065.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill the Second Evil Heart
quest_45065.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: The second giant heart thing is in Kur. I see a ruined tower, and underneath it is a necromancer. He's got minions guarding the heart.
quest_45065.SuccessText: That's another heart dead! Great work.

quest_45066.Description: Zhia Lian: The next envy pump is in a cave deep beneath Rahu. Use the sewers to reach that cave, and as always, bring friends: this heart is even stronger than the last.
quest_45066.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill the Third Evil Heart
quest_45066.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: The next envy pump is in a cave deep beneath Rahu. Use the sewers to reach that cave, and as always, bring friends: this heart is even stronger than the last.
quest_45066.SuccessText: That's the last heart defeated! Wait... Wait, no, there are more.

quest_45067.Description: Zhia Lian: I've located another envy pump. It's in Gazluk, in a cave. There are undead nearby. It's next to a pool of water. This one doesn't seem especially dangerous to fight, but it has tremendous regenerative powers. Good luck.
quest_45067.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill the Fourth Evil Heart
quest_45067.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: I've located another envy pump. It's in Gazluk, in a cave. There are undead nearby. It's next to a pool of water. This one doesn't seem especially dangerous to fight, but it has tremendous regenerative powers. Good luck.
quest_45067.SuccessText: Yet another heart defeated! Just a few more...

quest_45068.Description: Zhia Lian: There's another envy pump in Gazluk! This one's underneath Gazluk Keep. There are orcish necromancers tending to it. Remember to bring some friends. This looks hard.
quest_45068.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill the Fifth Evil Heart
quest_45068.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: There's another envy pump in Gazluk! This one's underneath Gazluk Keep. There are orcish necromancers tending to it. Remember to bring some friends. This looks hard.
quest_45068.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: The next one is... Wait... I think you did it! They're all gone! Tuvillus is going to be SO angry! Wow, you really should have thought about that: you're on his shit-list for sure now! But some mortals would consider that a badge of honor. By stopping the envy-pumps, you've saved a lot of lives. Or at least a lot of relationships. Great work!

quest_45071.Description: Brandon Mellus: I need you to get 144 barrels of beer to a place called the "Red Wing Casino". I've never been there, but it sounds fancy, and the banquet hall was cheap! I have no idea how to get this stuff delivered, but I'm betting you can make it happen! I'll hand you the barrels six at a time. You don't have to take them all at once! Don't overburden yourself: you'll throw out your back!
quest_45071.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Delivering The Beer

Objectives.Description: Deliver Kegs to Casino Party Planner

quest_45072.Description: You've delivered the beer for the party! You just need to let Brandon Mellus know that it's completed.
quest_45072.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Delivering The Beer

quest_45073.Description: Brandon Mellus in the Red Wing Casino said, "Westley got turned into an elf by Zhia Lian. He was pretty shaken up about it. He'd been this tough half-human and suddenly he was scrawny and weird. Ran off to find a cure. Last I heard he was headed to the edge of the Council Lands. There's a town near the border with Verta where a lot of elves live. It's called Serbule. He figured they might know something. Go check on him!"
quest_45073.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Help Westley the Elf
quest_45073.PrefaceText: Westley got turned into an elf by Zhia Lian. He was pretty shaken up about it. He'd been this tough half-human and suddenly he was scrawny and weird. Ran off to find a cure. Last I heard he was headed to the edge of the Council Lands. There's a town near the border with Verta where a lot of elves live. It's called Serbule. He figured they might know something. Go check on him!
quest_45073.SuccessText: So Westley wants to stay an elf? Well, good for him! He was pretty miserable as a halfie. So I guess he won't be showing up for the party...

quest_45074.Description:
Brandon Mellus in the Red Wing Casino said, "Deville got turned into a donkey. And that pretty much ruined his life. He couldn't talk at all for a long time and his parents wouldn't believe me that he was still in there! They decided he was just a donkey and their real son was dead, so they held a funeral for him. He really has no home to go back to now. But he still doesn't want to stay a donkey!

I've tried all kinds of schemes to cure Deville and Rick, but nothing worked. Deville eventually got fed up and left. A few months later, a talking bird stopped by to tell me Deville was living in Animal Town now. I've tried to figure out where that is, and my best guess is an island called "Sun Vale". See if you can find him!"
quest_45074.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Help Deville the Donkey
quest_45074.PrefaceText:
Deville got turned into a donkey. And that pretty much ruined his life. He couldn't talk at all for a long time and his parents wouldn't believe me that he was still in there! They decided he was just a donkey and their real son was dead, so they held a funeral for him. He really has no home to go back to now. But he still doesn't want to stay a donkey!

I've tried all kinds of schemes to cure Deville and Rick, but nothing worked. Deville eventually got fed up and left. A few months later, a talking bird stopped by to tell me Deville was living in Animal Town now. I've tried to figure out where that is, and my best guess is an island called "Sun Vale". See if you can find him!
quest_45074.SuccessText:
Deville is transformed back?! That's amazing news! Thank you!

I wonder what he's going to do now... I don't think he'll want to speak to his family again, not after how they acted... but I guess that's a problem for another day. We've still got a party to prepare for!

quest_45075.Description:
Brandon Mellus in the Red Wing Casino said, "Rick got turned into a mirror. For months he seemed like just a normal mirror, until one day words started appearing on him: "please destroy me", "you can't leave me like this forever", "you're my only friends and I'm begging you to end this", and so on. Eventually we agreed and tried to end his suffering... only to find out that he's indestructible. Or at least too hard for us to break!

So we just kept trying to find cures for him, because what else could we do? Eventually Rick calmed down about wanting to die, which was nice, but he still really wanted to not be a mirror. We tried all kinds of crazy stuff: talked to oracles, begged other gods for miracles, anything we could think of, but nothing worked.

Then a few months ago we heard about a special kind of magic in Gazluk. A shaman in an orc city there could supposedly help him. So I took Rick to this city with an orc guide we hired. The guide said we'd get in fine, but he was wrong: he was shot by a gigantic crossbow and died. I fled and orcs captured Rick. So all I can tell you is Rick is somewhere in Gazluk, maybe still in that orc city. I really don't think you should go look for him because you'll die. But if you do, tell him I'm sorry."
quest_45075.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Help Rick the Mirror
quest_45075.PrefaceText:
Rick got turned into a mirror. For months he seemed like just a normal mirror, until one day words started appearing on him: "please destroy me", "you can't leave me like this forever", "you're my only friends and I'm begging you to end this", and so on. Eventually we agreed and tried to end his suffering... only to find out that he's indestructible. Or at least too hard for us to break!

So we just kept trying to find cures for him, because what else could we do? Eventually Rick calmed down about wanting to die, which was nice, but he still really wanted to not be a mirror. We tried all kinds of crazy stuff: talked to oracles, begged other gods for miracles, anything we could think of, but nothing worked.

Then a few months ago we heard about a special kind of magic in Gazluk. A shaman in an orc city there could supposedly help him. So I took Rick to this city with an orc guide we hired. The guide said we'd get in fine, but he was wrong: he was shot by a gigantic crossbow and died. I fled and orcs captured Rick. So all I can tell you is Rick is somewhere in Gazluk, maybe still in that orc city. I really don't think you should go look for him because you'll die. But if you do, tell him I'm sorry.
quest_45075.SuccessText: You found Rick? That's amazing! And you got him cured?! That's amazinger! I can't wait to see him at the party!

quest_45076.Description:
Brandon Mellus in the Red Wing Casino said, "I guess you need to talk to Chaf too. The thing is that Chaf is perfectly fine. Zhia Lian only gave him a single coin when he wished for money, but that's really not a bad outcome when you ask Zhia Lian for a favor! Yet he has never stopped complaining.

Chaf's a gambler, always has been, and very superstitious. He insists that Zhia's coin is cursed. He also drinks a lot, and I'm afraid he's going to show up at the party and make a scene in front of Zhia. And that would be awful. Not just for him: for everyone!

Go talk to him -- he's already arrived at the casino (big shocker). He loves dice games, so look for him there."
quest_45076.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Help Chaf the Gambler

Objectives.Description: Help Chaf in Red Wing Casino

quest_45076.PrefaceText:
I guess you need to talk to Chaf too. The thing is that Chaf is perfectly fine. Zhia Lian only gave him a single coin when he wished for money, but that's really not a bad outcome when you ask Zhia Lian for a favor! Yet he has never stopped complaining.

Chaf's a gambler, always has been, and very superstitious. He insists that Zhia's coin is cursed. He also drinks a lot, and I'm afraid he's going to show up at the party and make a scene in front of Zhia. And that would be awful. Not just for him: for everyone!

Go talk to him -- he's already arrived at the casino (big shocker). He loves dice games, so look for him there.
quest_45076.SuccessText: So is Chaf cool? He's not going to get us all killed by a whimsical god? Good! That's a huge relief. Thank you!

quest_45077.Description:
Brandon Mellus in the Red Wing Casino said, "Since Zhia Lian is the goddess of Whimsy, we need a lot of very eccentric snacks. And unfortunately most of my best stuff was either stolen by cat men, or was lost in the desert as we fled for our lives. From cat men.

The casino will provide some boring snacks, but we definitely need some more exotic stuff! Let's start with a recipe from the Crone Hegemony. I found it in an old book! Can you get the ingredients?"
quest_45077.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Soup Prep
quest_45077.PrefaceText:
Since Zhia Lian is the goddess of Whimsy, we need a lot of very eccentric snacks. And unfortunately most of my best stuff was either stolen by cat men, or was lost in the desert as we fled for our lives. From cat men.

The casino will provide some boring snacks, but we definitely need some more exotic stuff! Let's start with a recipe from the Crone Hegemony. I found it in an old book! Can you get the ingredients?
quest_45077.SuccessText: Thanks. Ugh, those are horrid! Let's hope they cook up nicely! Oh, here's the recipe, if you're curious.

quest_45078.Description: Brandon Mellus in the Red Wing Casino said, "I think we need a backup soup in case the eyeball soup doesn't go over well. Can you get these ingredients?"
quest_45078.Name: Zhia Lian Event: More Soup Prep
quest_45078.PrefaceText: I think we need a backup soup in case the eyeball soup doesn't go over well. Can you get these ingredients?
quest_45078.SuccessText: Perfect! Zhia will either hate this or love it, but she won't be bored by it! And that's really the safest way you can party with Zhia Lian. Here's the recipe, in case you want to make some for a different party.

quest_45079.Description: Brandon Mellus in the Red Wing Casino said, "Let's round out the party's food offerings with something a little less disgusting! I got this recipe from my mother. Can you get the stuff?"
quest_45079.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Pumpkin Rolls
quest_45079.PrefaceText: Let's round out the party's food offerings with something a little less disgusting! I got this recipe from my mother. Can you get the stuff?
quest_45079.SuccessText:
Excellent work! Here's the recipe. Did we get everything? Hmm, yep, looks like it!

That's all the food preparation we need. Everything else can be handled by the bug-men. Thanks for all your help!

quest_45081.Description: Westley in Serbule asked for help gathering the ingredients for a medicinal balm.
quest_45081.Name: Zhia Lian Event: The Elven Medicine
quest_45081.SuccessText: Thank you! Oh, thank the gods. I've been rubbing myself raw! Sorry, bad imagery. The other elves keep telling me to watch my unsexy phrasing. But anyway, thank you.

quest_45082.Description:
Deville in Animal Town asked for help gathering the ingredients for a potion that should transform him back into a human.

He said the most difficult ingredient would be the heart of Vurrkan, a deadly drakeworm living in Sun Vale.
quest_45082.Name: Zhia Lian Event: The Donkey's Cure
quest_45082.SuccessText:
This is all the ingredients? I... don't know what to say!

I guess I'll take these to Silvia. What do you think the odds are that this will work? Well, it doesn't matter, because I've got to try! I thought I was coming to terms with being an ass, but I really want to be a person again!

But if it works, I'll have to say goodbye to my friends at Animal Town. Jumper is going to be devastated...

quest_45083.Description:
Melandria in Gazluk Keep asked you to procure some items needed for the ritual to break Rick's curse.

Melandria said that the flowers she needs only grow at night, near the glowy yellow crystals found in Gazluk.
quest_45083.Name: Zhia Lian Event: The Mirror Breaker
quest_45083.SuccessText: That's everything I need! When the coast is clear, I'll get my friend to perform the ritual. Then I'll sneak Rick out via ... well, I've said too much already. Not that I don't trust you, but sometimes the walls have ears... it's best if you just let me handle this. I'll get him home!

quest_45084.Description:
Chaf in the Red Wing Casino gave you his supposedly-cursed coin and asked you to beat the game of Monsters and Mantids to prove it's not really cursed.

Beating the game is incredibly hard, though, requiring you to win dozens of fights in a row without dying. You'll need luck and good table buffs, because this is no easy feat!
quest_45084.Name: Zhia Lian Event: The Gambler's Curse
quest_45084.SuccessText: I can't believe you did it! You beat the game! I guess I'm not cursed after all. That means... hey, that means I was just unlucky! Which means my luck should turn around any time now! Thanks! It's time to gamble!

quest_45085.Description: Zhia Lian: You're so cute as a bat, I love it! So bizarre! But in a whimsical way. If bats need a patron god, I'm on it! Hey... You know, maybe I could actually get that job. Hmmm... but do I even really want that job? Well, what do I know about bats? They hate bugs, right? Go check that idea: eat some size-appropriate wasps. Tell me how they taste.
quest_45085.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Bats Eat Bugs
quest_45085.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You're so cute as a bat, I love it! So bizarre! But in a whimsical way. If bats need a patron god, I'm on it! Hey... You know, maybe I could actually get that job. Hmmm... but do I even really want that job? Well, what do I know about bats? They hate bugs, right? Go check that idea: eat some size-appropriate wasps. Tell me how they taste.
quest_45085.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Did you eat their corpses? Oh, you... like your meat cooked? I didn't think bats cooked. That's whimsical, I guess, but also uninformative.

quest_45086.Description: Zhia Lian: I need to know how great bats really are. Can you fly in a snowstorm? And how dangerous are you, really? Hmm... Let's find out: go kill polar bears as a bat!
quest_45086.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Bats Eat Bears

Objectives.Description: Kill polar bears as a bat

quest_45086.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: I need to know how great bats really are. Can you fly in a snowstorm? And how dangerous are you, really? Hmm... Let's find out: go kill polar bears as a bat!
quest_45086.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: I guess it didn't look more absurd than usual. Okay, I'm still a fan of bats! But I can only really have one symbolic animal association... I really need to see something impressive here.

quest_45087.Description: Zhia Lian: I have a terrible dilemma: there are a bunch of mortals scheming to destroy your realm, and somebody needs to kill them. But I'm not an evil god, so I could never tell you to kill a mortal! Hahaha just kidding. Go kill those mortals!
quest_45087.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Those Mortals
quest_45087.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: I have a terrible dilemma: there are a bunch of mortals scheming to destroy your realm, and somebody needs to kill them. But I'm not an evil god, so I could never tell you to kill a mortal! Hahaha just kidding. Go kill those mortals!
quest_45087.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Grim. I have to say murder's not very whimsical. That's really my main complaint about it. But you did it well!

quest_45088.Description: Zhia Lian: Did you know that if you're willful enough, you can speak for a moment after you die? That's what I've heard anyway. You seem pretty willful; let's test that idea! Go find a stage, kill yourself, and right after you die, speak aloud. The crowd will love it! And oh yeah, I'll bring you back to life. Of course! Make sure you die on stage.
quest_45088.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Staged Death

Objectives.Description: Die on the stage, then say "I am slain!"

quest_45088.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Did you know that if you're willful enough, you can speak for a moment after you die? That's what I've heard anyway. You seem pretty willful; let's test that idea! Go find a stage, kill yourself, and right after you die, speak aloud. The crowd will love it! And oh yeah, I'll bring you back to life. Of course! Make sure you die on stage.
quest_45088.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Neat! But... speaking with the dead doesn't seem as fun anymore, now that I've seen you do it. I guess it was worth seeing, though. If you ever want to do that again, go ahead: I enchanted that stage to always resurrect corpses that say 'I am slain'. It was easier than resurrecting one specific mortal. Easier for me, I mean: whimsical things are easier than boring things!

quest_45089.Description: Zhia Lian: You should convince people to give you more candy! Or take it! MORE! The harvest is in, and it's time for greed! Show me 20 candies!
quest_45089.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Show Me The Candy
quest_45089.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You should convince people to give you more candy! Or take it! MORE! The harvest is in, and it's time for greed! Show me 20 candies!
quest_45089.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: You know, you're gonna get sick if you eat all of that candy. But candy is great, so what are you gonna do, right? Here: it's a recipe for a new healthier candy I just invented!

quest_45090.Description: Zhia Lian: Candles are an important part of many rituals. You should at least be able to make some tealights!
quest_45090.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Craft Tealights
quest_45090.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Candles are an important part of many rituals. You should at least be able to make some tealights!
quest_45090.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Good. Now let's go use them.

quest_45091.Description: Zhia Lian: I noticed a weird disturbance in the Eltibule graveyard. Go perform a normal cleansing ritual there and see if you can get whatever is there to come to the surface! Then kill it. Obviously.
quest_45091.Name: Zhia Lian Event: I Sense a Disturbance

Objectives.Description: Place tealights in the Eltibule graveyard at night
Touch the statue in the graveyard, deal with repercussions

quest_45091.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: I noticed a weird disturbance in the Eltibule graveyard. Go perform a normal cleansing ritual there and see if you can get whatever is there to come to the surface! Then kill it. Obviously.
quest_45091.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Oh, the disturbance was just a ghost? Well, it was shouting loudly into the aether -- loud enough for me to hear all the way over here. So it must have been especially sad. Good job removing it!

quest_45092.Description: Zhia Lian: You have a lot of undead-bashing to do, and you should do it with a little more style. Make some nice orange dye. It's the scariest!
quest_45092.Name: Zhia Lian Event: The Spookiest Color
quest_45092.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: You have a lot of undead-bashing to do, and you should do it with a little more style. Make some nice orange dye. It's the scariest!
quest_45092.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Hm. It's not as scary as I hoped. Try this! I know it doesn't seem scary, but this color just fits you better.

quest_45093.Description: Zhia Lian: I'm just a little worried that you're not prepared for the horrors you'll have to face. Some undead are VERY gross! You should practice getting sick. Try a wolfsbane bouquet. That will make you nice and sick.
quest_45093.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Get Sick on Wolfsbane
quest_45093.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: I'm just a little worried that you're not prepared for the horrors you'll have to face. Some undead are VERY gross! You should practice getting sick. Try a wolfsbane bouquet. That will make you nice and sick.
quest_45093.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: You look pretty bad. Like, maybe you should seek medical care? Hmm, I didn't think this plan through very well. Sigh... Drink this, and walk it off! We've got work to do!

quest_45094.Description: Zhia Lian: I forsee a problem with my Goddess of Bats plan: striga! You know, those bat-people who act as servants for the crones? They're Imatia's favored people, and they look like bats. I think the best plan here is to go on the offense. What I need you to do is start an undeniable rumor that giant bats hate and kill striga on sight. Do this by killing striga on sight!
quest_45094.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Bats Hate Striga
quest_45094.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: I forsee a problem with my Goddess of Bats plan: striga! You know, those bat-people who act as servants for the crones? They're Imatia's favored people, and they look like bats. I think the best plan here is to go on the offense. What I need you to do is start an undeniable rumor that giant bats hate and kill striga on sight. Do this by killing striga on sight!
quest_45094.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Yeah. I'm thinking maybe being Goddess of Bats would be fun. I'll talk to some of the other gods about it. Thanks for the help, and remember to spread rumors that bats hate striga! But... just to be clear, you don't actually need to hunt striga for me. I mean, they're sentient, and most of them are bookworms. They work as scribes, and they're already pretty afraid of giant bats. So just keep them on their toes, but don't overdo it. Otherwise my plan will backfire! Our pro-bat public relations scheme is going well, but there's more to do...

quest_45095.Description: Zhia Lian: Pumpkin Spice Tea is a good drink for sitting around and enjoying the season. But don't just sit around - that's boring! I want a drink that makes mortal blood pump faster! The very height of fall! Just bring me these ingredients and I'll make my own drink -- and teach you the recipe.
quest_45095.Name: Zhia Lian Event: I Fancy a Drink
quest_45095.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Pumpkin Spice Tea is a good drink for sitting around and enjoying the season. But don't just sit around - that's boring! I want a drink that makes mortal blood pump faster! The very height of fall! Just bring me these ingredients and I'll make my own drink -- and teach you the recipe.
quest_45095.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Ahh. Sometimes I create a mortal body just to drink these things! And I like the extra mint to make your breath smell good. *Cough*

quest_45096.Description: Zhia Lian: Hey, get this - there's supposedly a way to make pumpkin soup smell even weirder! Can you imagine? If you make a bowl, I want to see how it smells! I don't have the recipe, though; you'll have to find that first!
quest_45096.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Sour Pumpkin Soup
quest_45096.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Hey, get this - there's supposedly a way to make pumpkin soup smell even weirder! Can you imagine? If you make a bowl, I want to see how it smells! I don't have the recipe, though; you'll have to find that first!
quest_45096.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Whoa. That does smell weird and interesting, but... you realize it's poisonous, right? I'll pass. But thanks.

quest_45097.Description: Zhia Lian: There's been a terrible disaster that is vaguely related to me. It seems I didn't know enough frog biology. I thought I was helping! But nevermind the details. There are some pretty dangerous frogs in Povus and you should kill them for me! But one more thing, and I can't stress this part enough: you need to be naked when you do it. No shirt, no pants, no gloves! But you can wear, like, a hat. And shoes, obviously.
quest_45097.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Frogs Naked

Objectives.Description: Kill Toxic Frogs in Povus While Nude

quest_45097.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: There's been a terrible disaster that is vaguely related to me. It seems I didn't know enough frog biology. I thought I was helping! But nevermind the details. There are some pretty dangerous frogs in Povus and you should kill them for me! But one more thing, and I can't stress this part enough: you need to be naked when you do it. No shirt, no pants, no gloves! But you can wear, like, a hat. And shoes, obviously.
quest_45097.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Thanks for helping me out. I made some whimsical proclamations yesterday about a naked warrior saving the day, and you helped me keep my word! Sometimes whimsy takes work! And you looked cute out there! In fact, it didn't even seem that hard for you! I wonder...

quest_45098.Description: Zhia Lian: Your mostly-nude fighting earlier was impressive! It made me curious how good you really are without all that gear. Why don't you try nakedly killing some of those six-armed monsters in Povus? You can keep your hat and boots on, like last time!
quest_45098.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Hexapuses Naked
quest_45098.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Your mostly-nude fighting earlier was impressive! It made me curious how good you really are without all that gear. Why don't you try nakedly killing some of those six-armed monsters in Povus? You can keep your hat and boots on, like last time!
quest_45098.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Was that tougher? It still seemed like it was too easy for you. We should try one more! And I do have to admit, it's fun to watch your butt wiggle while you fight!

quest_45099.Description: Zhia Lian: Wait, don't put your pants, gloves, and shirt back on yet! This is the last nude fighting I'll ask you of you, so make it entertaining! There's this rude scion of Enoyos in Povus who's said some pretty unwise things about a certain god of whimsy. Why don't you kill him while nude! He's been magically empowered by Enoyos, so you might need some nude friends. Do you have nude friends? Look at you, of course you do!
quest_45099.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Fashnagar Naked
quest_45099.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Wait, don't put your pants, gloves, and shirt back on yet! This is the last nude fighting I'll ask you of you, so make it entertaining! There's this rude scion of Enoyos in Povus who's said some pretty unwise things about a certain god of whimsy. Why don't you kill him while nude! He's been magically empowered by Enoyos, so you might need some nude friends. Do you have nude friends? Look at you, of course you do!
quest_45099.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: That was great! You used cunning to overcome your lack of equipment! I'm pretty impressed. But I've grown unenamored of your gross mortal body. Get dressed! We have serious work to do!

quest_45101.Description: There's a barren festival tree at the Baroness's house in Serbule Hills. When fully decorated, townsfolk will leave you presents under the tree each day during the holiday season.
quest_45101.Name: Event: Festival Tree in Serbule Hills
quest_45101.SuccessText:
You've done a wonderful job gathering decorations. It's a scrappy tree, but it'll do the job.

The people around here like to stop by and leave presents for their friends under the tree. I'm sure you'll find gifts for yourself under the tree each day. The first present is from me. Come back tomorrow to see what else has shown up!

quest_45102.Description: Baroness Marith Felgard in Serbule Hills said, "Goblins are quite horrid little creatures, but they often decorate their calling-cards quite elegantly. I think if we had a number of calling-cards we could use them as makeshift tree decorations."
quest_45102.Name: Event: Goblin Calling Card Ornaments
quest_45102.PrefaceText: Goblins are quite horrid little creatures, but they often decorate their calling-cards quite elegantly. I think if we had a number of calling-cards we could use them as makeshift tree decorations.
quest_45102.SuccessText: These are a bit... grimy... but I'll just clean them up and add them to the tree!

quest_45103.Description: Baroness Marith Felgard in Serbule Hills said, "We're very low on resources this year so we'll have to get creative with our decorations. Hmm, how about grapes? They're colorful and relatively plentiful..."
quest_45103.Name: Event: Grapes For The Tree
quest_45103.PrefaceText: We're very low on resources this year so we'll have to get creative with our decorations. Hmm, how about grapes? They're colorful and relatively plentiful...
quest_45103.SuccessText: Perfect. I'll string these up and add them to the tree!

quest_45104.Description: Baroness Marith Felgard in Serbule Hills said, "There's a bunch of old holiday ornaments stored in Serbule Keep. Nelson Ballard is a stingy bastard, but perhaps you can persuade him to part with some of his ornaments?"
quest_45104.MidwayText: Who? Oh, that old bat... well, she can have the ugly red ornaments. Sorry, but all the pretty ones are needed here! I'll have Sir Coth bring them down.
quest_45104.Name: Event: 'Real' Ornaments
quest_45104.PrefaceText: There's a bunch of old holiday ornaments stored in Serbule Keep. Nelson Ballard is a stingy bastard, but perhaps you can persuade him to part with some of his ornaments?
quest_45104.SuccessText: A frumpy man brought some ornaments for us. Good work! I'll put them up.

quest_45105.Description: Baroness Marith Felgard in Serbule Hills said, "We need something large and beautiful to top the tree. I've seen some of the ranalon wearing decorative brooches that might work. Search the ones that stay down in the water and carry staves. 'Garden Masters', I think is what we call them."
quest_45105.Name: Event: Brooch Tree-Topper

Objectives.Description: Kill Ranalon Garden Masters for Brooch

quest_45105.PrefaceText: We need something large and beautiful to top the tree. I've seen some of the ranalon wearing decorative brooches that might work. Search the ones that stay down in the water and carry staves. 'Garden Masters', I think is what we call them.
quest_45105.SuccessText: Ah. Well it's large. And it will have to do. Thank you!

quest_45106.Description: There's a barren festival tree near Echur in Serbule. When fully decorated, townsfolk will leave you presents under the tree each day during the holiday season.
quest_45106.Name: Event: Festival Tree in Serbule
quest_45106.SuccessText:
I think that will do it! It looks hideous to my elven eyes, but I presume humans think this sort of thing is beautiful.

And since we're guests here, we're happy to honor human rites, including the presentation of gifts! We'll be taking turns placing gifts beneath the eyesore, and you should stop by every day in case there's presents for you! In fact, there's a little gift under there already, from me to you. Enjoy.

quest_45107.Description: Echur in Serbule said, "We need lots of cheap decorations. They should be bright and shiny and round. Hmm. Apples! Yes, fetch some apples. I'll get some myself, and together we should have enough."
quest_45107.Name: Event: Apples For The Tree
quest_45107.PrefaceText: We need lots of cheap decorations. They should be bright and shiny and round. Hmm. Apples! Yes, fetch some apples. I'll get some myself, and together we should have enough.
quest_45107.SuccessText: Thank you. These will make a lovely apple-snake that coils around the tree. Festive!

quest_45108.Description: Echur in Serbule said, "Sir Coth says it's traditional to decorate the tree with an ethnic human food called a 'gingerbread human'. He gave me a bunch of recipes... here's the simplest version. Can you prepare a batch?"
quest_45108.Name: Event: Gingerbread Humans
quest_45108.PrefaceText: Sir Coth says it's traditional to decorate the tree with an ethnic human food called a 'gingerbread human'. He gave me a bunch of recipes... here's the simplest version. Can you prepare a batch?
quest_45108.SuccessText:
Hmm... if I didn't know better, I'd say these were caricatures of humans meant to mock them... but apparently not! I'll add them to the tree.

Oh, and here: of the many recipes Sir Coth found for me, this is the only version of Gingerbread Humans that might actually be tasty. If you're ever in the mood for an ethnic cookie, maybe try out this recipe.

quest_45109.Description: Echur in Serbule said, "Nelson said he had some ornamentation appropriate for this celebration. Can you get it from him?"
quest_45109.MidwayText: Is that elf ready for the ornaments? Good. Now don't drop these, they're antique, and they're made of glass! Actually, you know what... I'll bring them to Echur myself. Thanks.
quest_45109.Name: Event: Classic Holiday Balls
quest_45109.PrefaceText: Nelson said he had some ornamentation appropriate for this celebration. Can you get it from him?
quest_45109.SuccessText: Oh, there you are. Nelson brought me the ornaments while you were gone. They're very intricate! Glass balls with little hooks. I suppose they're meant to represent fruit, but why not just use real fruit? Well, no matter. I'll toss them onto the tree.

quest_45110.Description:
Echur in Serbule said, "Okay, I need a bit of discreet help. Nelson gave me a decoration to put atop the tree, but I lost it! And I never lose things! So you know what this means: it was stolen. And I know who did it.

There's a certain rodent who's made my life miserable ever since I accidentally gave him super-intelligence. His name is Mister Squeaky and he lives somewhere northwest of town. Please bring back the star he stole!"
quest_45110.Name: Event: Star Tree-Topper
quest_45110.PrefaceText:
Okay, I need a bit of discreet help. Nelson gave me a decoration to put atop the tree, but I lost it! And I never lose things! So you know what this means: it was stolen. And I know who did it.

There's a certain rodent who's made my life miserable ever since I accidentally gave him super-intelligence. His name is Mister Squeaky and he lives somewhere northwest of town. Please bring back the star he stole!
quest_45110.SuccessText: Ah, you found it! Thank you! I feel bad about Mister Squeaky. He's a horrible little thing, but it's not his fault... it's mine. Anyway, onto the tree this goes!
