quest_45111.Description: There's an undecorated tree near Kleave in Eltibule. When fully decorated, townsfolk will leave you presents under the tree each day during the holiday season.
quest_45111.Name: Event: Festival Tree in Eltibule

Objectives.Description: Get Fire Dust for the Tree-Topper

quest_45111.SuccessText: Excellent work. We have created a tree with many sights and smells. I find it... engaging, if not attractive. Hopefully it will please Hogan, but even if not, he gave ME the authority and so he must accept MY decisions. I declare the tree complete; we shall commence gifting immediately.

quest_45112.Description: Kleave in Eltibule said, "Hogan explained that the tree should be decorated with a number of small orbs. This seems trivial. Please fetch some lumber and I shall carve some balls. Maple is fragrant; we should use that."
quest_45112.Name: Event: Wood For The Tree
quest_45112.PrefaceText: Hogan explained that the tree should be decorated with a number of small orbs. This seems trivial. Please fetch some lumber and I shall carve some balls. Maple is fragrant; we should use that.
quest_45112.SuccessText: Very good. Kalaba and I shall turn them into small balls and add them to the tree.

quest_45113.Description: Kleave in Eltibule said, "We need colorful and shiny decorations. After consulting with Kalaba, I have decided that the best colorful and shiny decorations would be the eyes of fallen foes. However, we should not use the eyes of sentient creatures. Hogan said that the tree should radiate peace. So animal eyes will have to do. Perhaps cat or dinosaur eyes."
quest_45113.Name: Event: Eyeball Decorations
quest_45113.PrefaceText: We need colorful and shiny decorations. After consulting with Kalaba, I have decided that the best colorful and shiny decorations would be the eyes of fallen foes. However, we should not use the eyes of sentient creatures. Hogan said that the tree should radiate peace. So animal eyes will have to do. Perhaps cat or dinosaur eyes.
quest_45113.SuccessText: These ornaments will stare into the soul of those who engage our tree! May those who come unprepared for gifting feel their hateful gaze! Excellent work!

quest_45114.Description: Kleave in Eltibule said, "Hogan gave us many complex requirements. Fragrance, sentiment, color, and reflectiveness must all be taken into account. I have it: fish! Shiny, colorful, fragrant, and sentimental ... to me, at least. Fetch fresh grapefish!"
quest_45114.Name: Event: Grapefish For The Tree
quest_45114.PrefaceText: Hogan gave us many complex requirements. Fragrance, sentiment, color, and reflectiveness must all be taken into account. I have it: fish! Shiny, colorful, fragrant, and sentimental ... to me, at least. Fetch fresh grapefish!
quest_45114.SuccessText:
Ah, their scent reminds me of my childhood on the docks of Rahu. I shall pose them as if they were swimming up a stream.

What? No. It is NOT artistic! You know that I hate art! This is merely whimsical artifice.

quest_45115.Description: Kleave in Eltibule said, "The top of the tree must be a beautiful beacon of strength and honor. Kalaba has been working on an appropriately beautiful blade to sit atop the tree. My contribution is to light it on fire with harmless decorative flames. I know a rakshasa recipe for decorative fire, but I need a large amount of fire dust!"
quest_45115.Name: Event: Fiery Tree-Topper
quest_45115.PrefaceText: The top of the tree must be a beautiful beacon of strength and honor. Kalaba has been working on an appropriately beautiful blade to sit atop the tree. My contribution is to light it on fire with harmless decorative flames. I know a rakshasa recipe for decorative fire, but I need a large amount of fire dust!
quest_45115.SuccessText: Very good. Kalaba has finished the blade. Let this weapon declare our presence to the heavens! We are not afraid of judgment! We are worthy of gifts!

quest_45116.Description: There's an undecorated tree in a house near Ukorga's inn in Kur Mountains. Nightshade is in charge of decorating it. When fully decorated, townsfolk will leave you presents under the tree each day during the holiday season.
quest_45116.Name: Event: Festival Tree in Kur Mountains

Objectives.Description: Get Matted Hair for the Tree
Get Ice Cores for the Tree-Topper

quest_45116.SuccessText: We've done it! A holiday tree that meets minimum expectations. And now I can stop worrying about this nonsense. Oh, but I placed a gift under the tree for you, as thanks. And I'm sure the rest of these ingrates will chip in on gifts too... even if I have to strongarm them a bit.

quest_45117.Description: Nightshade in Kur said, "We need something blue, and I think it would be pretty funny to cover the tree in fungus. Let's do that."
quest_45117.Name: Event: Lichen For The Tree
quest_45117.PrefaceText: We need something blue, and I think it would be pretty funny to cover the tree in fungus. Let's do that.
quest_45117.SuccessText: Hahaha! It's perfect! That'll teach them not to put me in charge of menial tasks!

quest_45118.Description: Nightshade in Kur said, "I've delegated the candy-cane creation to Laura Neth, but she insists she needs more cinnamon. Ugh. It's for decoration, who cares how it tastes?! But she's very insistent."
quest_45118.Name: Event: Candy Cane Prep
quest_45118.PrefaceText: I've delegated the candy-cane creation to Laura Neth, but she insists she needs more cinnamon. Ugh. It's for decoration, who cares how it tastes?! But she's very insistent.
quest_45118.SuccessText: Good. I'll get Laura Neth making the canes immediately. Thank you.

quest_45119.Description: Nightshade in Kur said, "We need tinsel. What can we make it from? It should be fluffy, light, and... I have it! Matted hairballs! We'll dye them red. Go, fetch some!"
quest_45119.Name: Event: Yeti Fur Tinsel
quest_45119.PrefaceText: We need tinsel. What can we make it from? It should be fluffy, light, and... I have it! Matted hairballs! We'll dye them red. Go, fetch some!
quest_45119.SuccessText: We should be able to tease these disgusting hairballs apart and dye them red. And by the by, I love this! I've met the obligations of my duty as tree-master, and yet nobody will ever ask me to do it again! It's perfect.

quest_45120.Description: Nightshade in Kur said, "Landri is a master ice-wizard. I've talked her into preparing a beautiful ice-gem to top the tree. She just needs a bit of magical ice. An 'ice core', she said. Better get two, in case I need to have her remake it in a different shape."
quest_45120.Name: Event: Ice Gem Tree-Topper
quest_45120.PrefaceText: Landri is a master ice-wizard. I've talked her into preparing a beautiful ice-gem to top the tree. She just needs a bit of magical ice. An 'ice core', she said. Better get two, in case I need to have her remake it in a different shape.
quest_45120.SuccessText: Wow, they're quite cold. And not very interesting to look at, are they? But don't worry. Landri can work her magic and we'll get a nice tree-topper out of it, I'm sure!

quest_45121.Description: There's an undecorated tree in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari desert. Kelim is in charge of decorating it. When fully decorated, townsfolk will leave you presents under the tree each day during the holiday season.
quest_45121.Name: Event: Festival Tree in Amulna

Objectives.Description: Get Manticore Manes for the Tree
Get Scorpion Stingers for the Tree-Topper

quest_45121.SuccessText: Well, that's all we need. Apparently if you put too many decorations on the tree, it becomes tacky, so we should stop here. Thanks for your help! And I put a present for you under the tree.

quest_45122.Description: Kelim in Amulna said, "The tree needs bright shiny red things... and now you see why I took on this stupid job! I need a lot of hot peppers.  A lot. Do you need some seeds? I still have some for sale!"
quest_45122.Name: Event: Peppers For The Tree
quest_45122.PrefaceText: The tree needs bright shiny red things... and now you see why I took on this stupid job! I need a lot of hot peppers.  A lot. Do you need some seeds? I still have some for sale!
quest_45122.SuccessText: Couldn't grow them better myself! Thanks. And hopefully their prominence on the tree will encourage people to eat more peppers.

quest_45123.Description: Kelim in Amulna said, "The tree smells horrible, doesn't it? All... piney. I think we should douse it with Telka's Tail. And hang the perfume bottles in the tree as decorations! I have lots of empty bottles, but no full ones. Can you get me two?"
quest_45123.Name: Event: Telka's Tail To Spice Up The Tree
quest_45123.PrefaceText: The tree smells horrible, doesn't it? All... piney. I think we should douse it with Telka's Tail. And hang the perfume bottles in the tree as decorations! I have lots of empty bottles, but no full ones. Can you get me two?
quest_45123.SuccessText: Ah, that's the stuff. I'll use my empty bottles as decorations and douse the tree with one of these bottles of perfume. I think I'll save the other bottle for myself.  We want to treat people to this beautiful scent, but not overwhelm them!

quest_45124.Description: Kelim in Amulna said, "This one is just impossible... we need something yellow and fluffy for 'tinsel', some sort of human decoration. Where would we get tinsel in the desert?! Are we supposed to shave a few manticores and use their manes?!"
quest_45124.Name: Event: Manticore Mane Tinsel
quest_45124.PrefaceText: This one is just impossible... we need something yellow and fluffy for 'tinsel', some sort of human decoration. Where would we get tinsel in the desert?! Are we supposed to shave a few manticores and use their manes?!
quest_45124.SuccessText: Hahaha you killed and shaved manticores?! That... is impressive. Okay... I was joking, but it will actually look nice on the tree. Thanks.

quest_45125.Description: Kelim in Amulna said, "We need something eye-catching to top the tree. How about... hmm... a pair of scorpion stingers?!"
quest_45125.Name: Event: Scorpion Stinger Tree-Topper
quest_45125.PrefaceText: We need something eye-catching to top the tree. How about... hmm... a pair of scorpion stingers?!
quest_45125.SuccessText: Wow, you got them! Hmm. They're kind of gross. But no problem; I'll have Gremix class them up with some metal or something.

quest_45126.Description: There's an undecorated tree in Rahu near Zhao's shop. When fully decorated, townsfolk will leave you presents under the tree each day during the holiday season.
quest_45126.Name: Event: Festival Tree in Rahu

Objectives.Description: Get Vagabond Ears for the Tree
Get N Cores for the Tree Lights

quest_45126.SuccessText: Excellent work. Now the festivities can begin! I'll let everyone know it's time to bring their gifts. And I've left your first gift under the tree already.

quest_45127.Description: Zhao in Rahu said, "I do understand that this is a peaceful holiday. But if we want the people of Rahu to be excited, it needs to incorporate some of our culture! Traditionally our celebrations feature trophies from our fallen enemies. But we are at peace right now... so perhaps the least-offensive trophies would be from fellow rakshasa. The vile bandits in the desert prey upon the weak and the pitiful. Kill them, sever their ears, and bring them back. Oh, and please try to focus on bandits with big healthy ears."
quest_45127.Name: Event: Severed Ears For The Tree
quest_45127.PrefaceText: I do understand that this is a peaceful holiday. But if we want the people of Rahu to be excited, it needs to incorporate some of our culture! Traditionally our celebrations feature trophies from our fallen enemies. But we are at peace right now... so perhaps the least-offensive trophies would be from fellow rakshasa. The vile bandits in the desert prey upon the weak and the pitiful. Kill them, sever their ears, and bring them back. Oh, and please try to focus on bandits with big healthy ears.
quest_45127.SuccessText: These will do. I'll preserve them and string them up for the tree. Also, you may be relieved to hear this: I asked Daniel Murderdark about using ears on his peoples' festival tree. I expected he'd be offended, but he said it was 'awesome'. So don't worry about it! Humans are more understanding than I expected.

quest_45128.Description: Zhao in Rahu said, "As I understand it, most of the tree's decorations should be large, round, colorful balls. How about lemons?"
quest_45128.Name: Event: Lemons For The Tree
quest_45128.PrefaceText: As I understand it, most of the tree's decorations should be large, round, colorful balls. How about lemons?
quest_45128.SuccessText: Excellent work. And perhaps the citrus smell will hide some of the repugnant pine odor, too!

quest_45129.Description: Zhao in Rahu said, "The tree came with a complex system of wires and sparking mechanisms. Apparently they can make the tree glow. I've asked Ufkar to reverse-engineer it, and he says we can make it work with a power source. A few dwarven N cores ought to work."
quest_45129.Name: Event: Dwarven N Cores To Light The Tree
quest_45129.PrefaceText: The tree came with a complex system of wires and sparking mechanisms. Apparently they can make the tree glow. I've asked Ufkar to reverse-engineer it, and he says we can make it work with a power source. A few dwarven N cores ought to work.
quest_45129.SuccessText: Very good. Ufkar has finished his preparations, so we are ready to light the tree! Let us hope that we don't burn down the city...

quest_45130.Description: Zhao in Rahu said, "The tree should be topped with a large decoration. But what decoration? There were no instructions. Since this is a human celebration of Ri-Shin, the god of plants and trees, it makes sense to use a wooden decoration, no? Fetch me a large load of spruce and I'll ask Daniel Murderdark what we should make with it."
quest_45130.Name: Event: Spruce for the Tree-Topper
quest_45130.PrefaceText: The tree should be topped with a large decoration. But what decoration? There were no instructions. Since this is a human celebration of Ri-Shin, the god of plants and trees, it makes sense to use a wooden decoration, no? Fetch me a large load of spruce and I'll ask Daniel Murderdark what we should make with it.
quest_45130.SuccessText:
Thank you for the spruce. I have consulted with Daniel Murderdark who says that a large human skull is an appropriate tree-topper. Amutasa has agreed to sculpt one from your lumber.

I have some suspicions about Daniel's truthfulness. His skeleton started to interject with a comment and Daniel shushed it. But what else can I do? This is all I have to go on. And a giant wooden skull does sound festive!

quest_45131.Description: There's an undecorated tree in Animal Town near Spot's tent. When fully decorated, townsfolk will leave you presents under the tree each day during the holiday season.
quest_45131.Name: Event: Festival Tree in Animal Town
quest_45131.SuccessText: We did it! This is a good tree so now we get presents. I'll tell everybody! Go! Go get your present!

quest_45132.Description: Spot in Animal Town said, "Okay. We need round things on the tree. Round. Round round round. Think... Oh, onions are round! Get lots of onions."
quest_45132.Name: Event: Onions For The Tree
quest_45132.PrefaceText: Okay. We need round things on the tree. Round. Round round round. Think... Oh, onions are round! Get lots of onions.
quest_45132.SuccessText: You got onions! This is easy! We're almost done!

quest_45133.Description: Spot in Animal Town said, "We need stringy things. Like... um, string. No, string is ugly. Sausages! Sausages are stringy! Get some! But please please don't tell Norbert because he yells at me when I say I like sausage. Please? Okay good."
quest_45133.Name: Event: Sausages For The Tree
quest_45133.PrefaceText: We need stringy things. Like... um, string. No, string is ugly. Sausages! Sausages are stringy! Get some! But please please don't tell Norbert because he yells at me when I say I like sausage. Please? Okay good.
quest_45133.SuccessText: Oh give them! I want sausages! ... But I'll only eat some of them. The others go on the tree.

quest_45134.Description: Spot in Animal Town said, "We need round things for the tree! Round... round... like plates. Plates! Get some plates. This many. [Spot holds up a varying number of fingers, changing her mind every few seconds. You decide that a half-dozen plates will do.]"
quest_45134.Name: Event: Plates For The Tree
quest_45134.PrefaceText: We need round things for the tree! Round... round... like plates. Plates! Get some plates. This many. [Spot holds up a varying number of fingers, changing her mind every few seconds. You decide that a half-dozen plates will do.]
quest_45134.SuccessText:
Plates? For the tree?! That's silly!

Ohhhh... because they're round! Good idea! Okay I'll put them on the tree. I have more plates, too! We'll put plates all over the tree!

quest_45135.Description: Spot in Animal Town said, "We need a big thing on top of the tree. And it should be something animals make. Like... poop. No... like meat! No... like cheese! Yes! Animals make cheese! Get a big hard cheese."
quest_45135.Name: Event: Cheesy Tree-Topper
quest_45135.PrefaceText: We need a big thing on top of the tree. And it should be something animals make. Like... poop. No... like meat! No... like cheese! Yes! Animals make cheese! Get a big hard cheese.
quest_45135.SuccessText: Now we have a cheese tree! Yay!

quest_45136.Description: There's an undecorated tree in the Red Wing Casino. When fully decorated, casino employees will leave you presents under the tree each day during the holiday season.
quest_45136.Name: Event: Festival Tree in Red Wing Casino

Objectives.Description: Get Game Chips for the Tree
Get Red Roses to dye the Tree-Topper

quest_45136.SuccessText:
Finally! The tree adornments are complete! May it shine as a beacon of culture throughout the holiday.

As is the custom, each day we shall place a gift under the tree for our most prized patrons. I've placed your first gift under the tree already!

quest_45137.Description:
Irkima in Red Wing Casino said, "As I understand it, our Ri-Shin tree should be decorated with items that evoke memories of our venue. Several customers told me that when they think of Red Wing, they think of 'rollin' the bones'. I do not know why they associate grim body parts with our lovely establishment, but I'm sure it's another racist anti-insect thing. These connotations are hurtful, but we aim to make our guests happy, so bones it is!

Unfortunately I used up my supply of bones during some recent shamanic infusion experiments... do you happen to have a surplus? Do not concern yourself with their rollability; any bones will do at this stage."
quest_45137.Name: Event: Bones For Rollin'
quest_45137.PrefaceText:
As I understand it, our Ri-Shin tree should be decorated with items that evoke memories of our venue. Several customers told me that when they think of Red Wing, they think of 'rollin' the bones'. I do not know why they associate grim body parts with our lovely establishment, but I'm sure it's another racist anti-insect thing. These connotations are hurtful, but we aim to make our guests happy, so bones it is!

Unfortunately I used up my supply of bones during some recent shamanic infusion experiments... do you happen to have a surplus? Do not concern yourself with their rollability; any bones will do at this stage.
quest_45137.SuccessText:
Oh, the bones! I must apologize: having conferred with Dorimir Fangblade, I have learned that 'rollin' the bones' is an idiom for dice-rolling. And we happen to have a large supply of dice on hand, so we shall just use those on the tree!

I asked Dorimir if I could hang the bones you brought me as well, since you went to all the effort, but he hinted that they would be a grim reminder of our guests' mortality, and thus inappropriate. But they will not go to waste: Tavilak expressed enthusiasm about using them for fertilizer. Thank you for your effort!

quest_45138.Description:
Irkima in Red Wing Casino said, "Red Wing is famous for our gaming, so I proposed we use Monsters and Mantids game chips on the tree. However, our game chips are very valuable and we fear inebriated guests may purloin them.

Dorimir suggests we instead use the worthless 'game chips' that are often used in home games. If you could just find a few examples of these chips, I'll have our goblin maintenance team create more."
quest_45138.Name: Event: Game Chips For The Tree

Objectives.Description: Obtain Red, Green, or Yellow Game Chips

quest_45138.PrefaceText:
Red Wing is famous for our gaming, so I proposed we use Monsters and Mantids game chips on the tree. However, our game chips are very valuable and we fear inebriated guests may purloin them.

Dorimir suggests we instead use the worthless 'game chips' that are often used in home games. If you could just find a few examples of these chips, I'll have our goblin maintenance team create more.
quest_45138.SuccessText: Thank you! These game chips are a bit small, but I will ask the goblin crew to create oversized versions.

quest_45139.Description: Irkima in Red Wing Casino said, "At the Ri-Shin celebration in Statehelm, the trees are lit with fairy lights! Our tree must be lit as well. There are a few fairy shopkeepers in the employ of the casino, and Laphylla says she can place a glamour on our tree... but she demands payment in a substance called 'pixie sugar'. Can you obtain this?"
quest_45139.Name: Event: Payment For Fairy Lights
quest_45139.PrefaceText: At the Ri-Shin celebration in Statehelm, the trees are lit with fairy lights! Our tree must be lit as well. There are a few fairy shopkeepers in the employ of the casino, and Laphylla says she can place a glamour on our tree... but she demands payment in a substance called 'pixie sugar'. Can you obtain this?
quest_45139.SuccessText: Thank you! I shall take this to Laphylla promptly so that she can place a glamour on our tree.

quest_45140.Description:
Irkima in Red Wing Casino said, "The tree is supposed to be topped with a personalized symbol of our culture. Dorimir suggested that we use a large top hat, since mantises love hats so much. He was being mirthful, but his suggestion has merit!

As the casino's official calligrapher, I am of course skilled in creating elaborate paper props. I've fashioned a suitable top hat, but its bow is not sufficiently festive: I need a better shade of red dye! I believe crushed rose petals will be suitable. Are those easy to find?"
quest_45140.Name: Event: Dapper Tree-Topper
quest_45140.PrefaceText:
The tree is supposed to be topped with a personalized symbol of our culture. Dorimir suggested that we use a large top hat, since mantises love hats so much. He was being mirthful, but his suggestion has merit!

As the casino's official calligrapher, I am of course skilled in creating elaborate paper props. I've fashioned a suitable top hat, but its bow is not sufficiently festive: I need a better shade of red dye! I believe crushed rose petals will be suitable. Are those easy to find?
quest_45140.SuccessText: Thank you! These flowers are a lovely color! I hope the shade comes through in the hat decoration. If not, I suppose I shall just use a different red dye.

quest_45141.Description: There's an undecorated tree in the New Prestonbule cave. When fully decorated, townsfolk will leave you presents under the tree each day during the holiday season.
quest_45141.Name: Event: Festival Tree in New Prestonbule

Objectives.Description: Get Red Gems for the Tree

quest_45141.SuccessText: Well, can't say that tree'd win any beauty prizes, but it feels homey. Thank you. You're part of the family here too, so we got ya something under the tree.

quest_45142.Description: Rick Snapley in New Prestonbule said, "A good Ri-Shin tree should be covered in red baubles. The shinier the better. We need a big pile of rubies or whatever!"
quest_45142.Name: Event: Red Gems For The Tree
quest_45142.PrefaceText: A good Ri-Shin tree should be covered in red baubles. The shinier the better. We need a big pile of rubies or whatever!
quest_45142.SuccessText:
Oh ho ho, now THESE are nice gems! So, question for ya: Sona wants to use heavy wire to make the gems look like they're floatin' off the tree. I told her they're supposed to look like fruit, nestled under the leaves... but then she asks why, since you can't eat 'em... and I don't really have an answer! What do you think we should do?

Oh, what's that? Sure, of course! We'll get these beauties back to you after the holiday, don't worry! I mean... unless they get stolen by orcs or something...

quest_45143.Description: Rick Snapley in New Prestonbule said, "I remember as a snotrat having to cut out hundreds of paper snowflakes for the tree each year. Tedious work, but it taught me how to use a knife! We'll need some stencils, though... otherwise they won't all be even, and then what's the point?"
quest_45143.Name: Event: Snowflakes For The Tree
quest_45143.PrefaceText: I remember as a snotrat having to cut out hundreds of paper snowflakes for the tree each year. Tedious work, but it taught me how to use a knife! We'll need some stencils, though... otherwise they won't all be even, and then what's the point?
quest_45143.SuccessText: Perfect. Now I'll get these lazy dwarves (and Sona) to start cutting out snowflakes. Thanks!

quest_45144.Description:
Rick Snapley in New Prestonbule said, "I'm trying to bring the whole cave together here, so I got the orcs involved in decorating too. As a race they're not real known for their decorations, but Gasu'um collects empty potion bottles, so let's put 'em on the tree!

She gave me a bunch of Rage to Heat bottles... we just need a few more."
quest_45144.Name: Event: Potions For The Tree
quest_45144.PrefaceText:
I'm trying to bring the whole cave together here, so I got the orcs involved in decorating too. As a race they're not real known for their decorations, but Gasu'um collects empty potion bottles, so let's put 'em on the tree!

She gave me a bunch of Rage to Heat bottles... we just need a few more.
quest_45144.SuccessText: Hey, these potion bottles are still full! Well, Gasu'um drinks this stuff like water, so don't expect 'em to last long! Thanks though... this'll work.

quest_45145.Description:
Rick Snapley in New Prestonbule said, "A Ri-Shin tree needs a topper, something that glows. But I don't wanna use one of those glowing yellow crystals... I know Sona says she can make 'em safe, but it's too dangerous.

Let's just... I dunno, let's just stick some candles on top, like my family used to do. But we'll need to light 'em every night... got any spare tealights?"
quest_45145.Name: Event: Tealight Tree-Topper
quest_45145.PrefaceText:
A Ri-Shin tree needs a topper, something that glows. But I don't wanna use one of those glowing yellow crystals... I know Sona says she can make 'em safe, but it's too dangerous.

Let's just... I dunno, let's just stick some candles on top, like my family used to do. But we'll need to light 'em every night... got any spare tealights?
quest_45145.SuccessText:
Thanks! These aren't half bad.

Hmmm... the candles are too heavy, they're bending the branches down... do you think it'll catch the tree on fire? Nah, it's fine. I'm just overthinking this!

quest_45151.Description: There's an undecorated tree in the Fae Realm. When fully decorated, townsfolk will leave you presents under the tree each day during the holiday season.
quest_45151.Name: Event: Festival Tree in the Fae Realm

Objectives.Description: Get Fae Honeycombs for the Tree
Get Pixie Dust and Pipe for the Tree
Get Safety Equipment for the Tree

quest_45151.SuccessText: Now that's a fancy tree! Although in retrospect, I kind of wish I didn't have to feed the ornaments to keep them alive. Oh well, we'll do better next year. Now it's time for presents!

quest_45152.Description:
Backfat in the Fae Realm said, "A Ri-Shin tree has to reflect its people. Hah, I know: wouldn't butterflies look great?! Representational, kinda. And also the fairies love 'em. But there's a catch: they have to be alive. Dead butterflies would upset a lot of the fae here.

Crimsonfelt butterflies would look nicest, but they eat cinders out of the air, and there's no way I'm feeding 'em cinders every day. How about some nice pretty rose-mourning butterflies? They're a little smaller, but they can survive on sugar water.

Go catch a whole bunch of 'em! Here's a net."
quest_45152.Name: Event: Butterflies for the Tree
quest_45152.PrefaceText:
A Ri-Shin tree has to reflect its people. Hah, I know: wouldn't butterflies look great?! Representational, kinda. And also the fairies love 'em. But there's a catch: they have to be alive. Dead butterflies would upset a lot of the fae here.

Crimsonfelt butterflies would look nicest, but they eat cinders out of the air, and there's no way I'm feeding 'em cinders every day. How about some nice pretty rose-mourning butterflies? They're a little smaller, but they can survive on sugar water.

Go catch a whole bunch of 'em! Here's a net.
quest_45152.SuccessText: These are nice ones. Did you explain to them what's happening? ... Oh, you don't speak Fae Insect at all? Huh. Well, don't worry about it. I'll get 'em situated.

quest_45153.Description:
Backfat in the Fae Realm said, "You'd expect fairy lights to be pretty easy to get here in the fae realm. All these fairies can make sparkly lights! But Pegast says they can't waste them on frivolities. And that turns into the same argument I always have with these guys: what ISN'T frivolous to an immortal?

Anyway, it's cool, I found somebody to make 'em for us on the quiet. I just need to pay him. In honeycombs... lots of honeycombs."
quest_45153.Name: Event: Honeycomb-For-Lights Trade
quest_45153.PrefaceText:
You'd expect fairy lights to be pretty easy to get here in the fae realm. All these fairies can make sparkly lights! But Pegast says they can't waste them on frivolities. And that turns into the same argument I always have with these guys: what ISN'T frivolous to an immortal?

Anyway, it's cool, I found somebody to make 'em for us on the quiet. I just need to pay him. In honeycombs... lots of honeycombs.
quest_45153.SuccessText: You got the honeycombs? Good work! We'll get this tree sparklin'!

quest_45154.Description: Backfat in the Fae Realm said, "I don't think fairies would appreciate normal tree ornaments. But Marrowchomp had a great idea for something much better! It's a pixie-dust shower. Almost completely safe! And we already have most of the parts. I just need some pixie dust, and some piping."
quest_45154.Name: Event: Special Effects For The Tree
quest_45154.PrefaceText: I don't think fairies would appreciate normal tree ornaments. But Marrowchomp had a great idea for something much better! It's a pixie-dust shower. Almost completely safe! And we already have most of the parts. I just need some pixie dust, and some piping.
quest_45154.SuccessText: Haha, great, this is great! Okay, that's finished Marrowchomp's design. Let's power it up. It should go off every few seconds. Watch and see!

quest_45155.Description:
Backfat in the Fae Realm said, "I found the perfect topper for the tree! It's a chunk of that soul-rock stuff the fairies use for everything. It looks like a tiny lifestone! But there's bad news: Pegast says it's not actually from a lifestone. It's a part of an old defense turret, and it could re-activate at any time, killing all non-fae in the area. That would be a terrible way to die.

Don't worry, there's apparently a way to disable it. It's complicated, but it'll be worth the effort! We need mercury, winterprize, and some wire."
quest_45155.Name: Event: Disabling the Tree-Topper
quest_45155.PrefaceText:
I found the perfect topper for the tree! It's a chunk of that soul-rock stuff the fairies use for everything. It looks like a tiny lifestone! But there's bad news: Pegast says it's not actually from a lifestone. It's a part of an old defense turret, and it could re-activate at any time, killing all non-fae in the area. That would be a terrible way to die.

Don't worry, there's apparently a way to disable it. It's complicated, but it'll be worth the effort! We need mercury, winterprize, and some wire.
quest_45155.SuccessText: You got everything? Great! I'm gonna let  somebody with hands do the actual work, but I'll make sure it gets done quick. Thanks!

quest_45156.Description: Find the Shrine of Ri-Shin along the southern coast in Kur Mountains. Speak to Snowleaf, the Scion of Ri-Shin.
quest_45156.Name: Event: Shrine of Ri-Shin
quest_45156.PrefaceText: You become aware of a powerful presence reaching out to you. Does Dreva have a task for you? A voice speaks in your mind: Find the Shrine of Ri-Shin in the Kur Mountains. Ri-Shin is a strong ally; render whatever aid is needed.

quest_45157.Description: Find the Shrine of Ri-Shin along the southern coast in Kur Mountains. Speak to Snowleaf, the Scion of Ri-Shin.
quest_45157.Name: Event: Shrine of Ri-Shin
quest_45157.PrefaceText: You become aware of a powerful presence reaching out to you. There are no words ... But you have the strangest sensation that you should search the wilds of Kur Mountains for a ... shrine? To Ri-Shin?

quest_45158.Description: There's an undecorated tree in Povus. When fully decorated, townsfolk will leave you presents under the tree each day during the holiday season.
quest_45158.Name: Event: Festival Tree in Povus

Objectives.Description: Get Old Bones for the Tree
Get Mushrooms and Dye for the Tree
Get Alchemical Reagents for the Tree
Get Miss Fly-Hater for the Tree-Topper

quest_45158.SuccessText: Ha ha! Look at that froggy monstrosity! I think it's great. You did good. Thanks!

quest_45159.Description: Leah Bowman in Povus said, "I know this sounds weird, because it is, but next we need some old bones. The rakshasa love seeing them on the tree."
quest_45159.Name: Event: Old, Old, Bones
quest_45159.PrefaceText: I know this sounds weird, because it is, but next we need some old bones. The rakshasa love seeing them on the tree.
quest_45159.SuccessText: A nice big pile of bones. I'll get them sorted and organized, and on the tree. They'll be... truly hideous. But that's just my opinion based on my human upbringing! They'll get all the town's rakshasa in a festive mood, and that's what matters.

quest_45160.Description: Leah Bowman in Povus said, "When the town was healthier, we used to put prettied-up mushrooms on the tree. Fly amanita grows everywhere around here, so that's not a problem. But I don't know how to make the dye! We need a nice tomato red dye to cover the stems."
quest_45160.Name: Event: Pretty Mushrooms
quest_45160.PrefaceText: When the town was healthier, we used to put prettied-up mushrooms on the tree. Fly amanita grows everywhere around here, so that's not a problem. But I don't know how to make the dye! We need a nice tomato red dye to cover the stems.
quest_45160.SuccessText: Great! You gather the ingredients, I'll get them painted. We're making a great team!

quest_45161.Description: Leah Bowman in Povus said, "It's tradition to use glow bottles on the tree. The alchemist who used to make them is dead now, but she taught me the technique! Most of the ingredients are pretty upsetting, seeing as they come from living animals. But remember, this is for presents! So if you get the parts, I'll make the jars."
quest_45161.Name: Event: Glow Bottles
quest_45161.PrefaceText: It's tradition to use glow bottles on the tree. The alchemist who used to make them is dead now, but she taught me the technique! Most of the ingredients are pretty upsetting, seeing as they come from living animals. But remember, this is for presents! So if you get the parts, I'll make the jars.
quest_45161.SuccessText: You got all the stuff? Well I guess it's my turn to get my hands dirty. Now where did I leave those potion jars from last time?

quest_45162.Description:
Leah Bowman in Povus said, "Now for the most important part: the tree topper. It has to be Miss Fly-Hater! She's a gigantic frog that comes out of hibernation right around now. She lives on a little island in the middle of the river, and we bring her in to sit on the tree and catch bugs. She loves it, the town loves it, we all win!

Now don't hurt her! The town will never forgive us if she's hurt."
quest_45162.Name: Event: Miss Fly-Hater
quest_45162.PrefaceText:
Now for the most important part: the tree topper. It has to be Miss Fly-Hater! She's a gigantic frog that comes out of hibernation right around now. She lives on a little island in the middle of the river, and we bring her in to sit on the tree and catch bugs. She loves it, the town loves it, we all win!

Now don't hurt her! The town will never forgive us if she's hurt.
quest_45162.SuccessText: You found her! Hi, Miss Fly-Hater! Wait, uh... Hm. Well, this isn't the same exact frog as before, but let's just keep that between us. He has a great temperament and he looks hungry, so I'm sure this will work out fine! I'll keep an eye on him.

quest_45201.Description: A roaming caravan of master crafters have stopped at the Red Wing Casino for a few days of rest, restocking, and a chance to study some of the local crafts. They have rented the Theater Room for their staging area. Go pay them a visit and see if they can help you advance your craft skills faster!
quest_45201.Name: Event: The Crafting Caravan
quest_45201.PrefaceText: A roaming caravan of master crafters and their apprentices have stopped at the Red Wing Casino for a few days of rest, restocking, and a chance to study some of the local crafts. They have rented the Theater Room for their staging area. Go pay them a visit and see if they can help you advance your craft skills faster!

quest_45202.Description: Raim said, "Want to swap some knowledge to progress your skills? Bring me one full crafted Rough Cloth suit and I will see what I can do to help you flourish at your craft! I only want the enchanted version of the suit... I don't deal with non-enchanted crap!"
quest_45202.Name: Tailoring: A Rough Suit for Raim
quest_45202.PrefaceText: Want to swap some knowledge to progress your skills? Bring me one full crafted Rough Cloth suit and I will see what I can do to help you flourish at your craft! I only want the enchanted version of the suit... I don't deal with non-enchanted crap!
quest_45202.SuccessText: Thank you! I will study this to see if I can improve my own skills. As promised, here's a little something to help you along as well. If you want to share some more knowledge later, come see me again! [You earn 5 favor with Orran the Caravan Leader] [This task is repeatable every 20 hours.]

quest_45203.Description: Raim said, "Want to swap some knowledge to progress your skills? Bring me one full crafted Decent Cloth suit and I will see what I can do to help you flourish at your craft!"

quest_45212.Description: Kimoc said, "We are low on supplies to better our anatomy skills! Sure, we could make them ourselves, but we don't want to steal all the fun!  If you would be so kind as to deliver 10 Autopsy Kits to me, I would be forever greatful! Honestly we're just low on materials, but I can help you advance your craft in exchange for your trouble."
quest_45212.Name: Toolcrafting: Autopsy Kits for Kimoc
quest_45212.PrefaceText: We are low on supplies to better our anatomy skills! Sure, we could make them ourselves, but we don't want to steal all the fun!  If you would be so kind as to deliver 10 Autopsy Kits to me, I would be forever greatful! Honestly we're just low on materials, but I can help you advance your craft in exchange for your trouble.
quest_45212.SuccessText: Thank you! This will help us along for a while. I might need your services again later on, so be sure to stop by again later! [You earn 5 favor with Orran the Caravan Leader] [This task is repeatable every 20 hours.]

quest_45213.Description: Kimoc said, "We are low on supplies to better our anatomy skills! Sure, we could make them ourselves, but we don't want to steal all the fun! quest_45215.Description: Kimoc said, "We are low on our diagnostic supplies and need to restock. Sure, we could make them ourselves, but we don't want to steal all the fun!  If you would be so kind as to deliver 10 Carbon-form Scrutinizer Arrays to me, I would be forever greatful! Honestly we're just low on materials, but I can help you advance your craft in exchange for your trouble."
quest_45215.Name: Toolcrafting: Carbon-form Scrutinizer Arrays for Kimoc
quest_45215.PrefaceText: We are low on our diagnostic supplies and need to restock. Sure, we could make them ourselves, but we don't want to steal all the fun! quest_45216.Description: Kimoc said, "A lot of us like to whittle a lot, so our supply of whittling knives are running low. Sure, we could make them ourselves, but we don't want to steal all the fun!  If you would be so kind as to deliver 10 Master Whittling Knives to me, I would be forever greatful! Honestly we're just low on materials, but I can help you advance your craft in exchange for your trouble."
quest_45216.Name: Toolcrafting: Master Whittling Knives for Kimoc
quest_45216.PrefaceText: A lot of us like to whittle a lot, so our supply of whittling knives are running low. Sure, we could make them ourselves, but we don't want to steal all the fun!  If you would be so kind as to deliver 10 Master Whittling Knives to me, I would be forever greatful! Honestly we're just low on materials, but I can help you advance your craft in exchange for your trouble.

quest_45217.Description: Serrold said, "I can tell you're a cheesemaker... you have that smell about you! Making cheese on the go can always be difficult, and we really could use a stock of something other than what Serrold and myself are carrying. If you would be willing to bring me 10 pieces of Mild Cheddar Cheese, I will share some of my cheesemaking experience with you!"
quest_45217.Name: Cheesemaking: Mild Cheddar Cheese for Serrold

quest_45261.Description: Jopol said, "Greetings! I used to be the Caravan's Master Carpenter, but we keep running out of arrows so quickly I decided to let Kalrod take over my position and I became the Caravan fletcher. I could really use some help getting caught up on things. Could you assemble and deliver 10,000 basic arrows? I would really appreciate it!"
quest_45261.Name: Fletching: Basic Arrows for Jopol
quest_45261.PrefaceText: Greetings! quest_45301.Description:
Hail citizen of Alharth!

We are looking for ambitious adventurers to join the ranks of the Civil Service! We are volunteers that go above and beyond to ensure our lands are a wonderful place to live! 

We are currently looking for recruits willing to help out with our periodic dungeon and cave clearing. If left unchecked, these places slowly overfill with critters and eventually spill out to bring chaos and mayhem on the people of Alharth!

Journey to these places and give them a good cleaning! It's not all for free either: we're willing to pay you for your troubles! We have installed tracking crystals in each of the areas to ensure you are showing up and doing the work. There are 2 of these crystals in each area. Once you have cleared the area, just use the crystal to check in and your work progress will be logged for payroll. After you have checked in to both crystals in that area, you will gain access to the reward cache located at the area entrance. Look through what's in there and pick out whatever looks interesting to you.

If you manage to complete all the tasks on the list, you may return to Serbule Keep and access the Grand Reward Cache located in a building across from the Inn for something much nicer! 

We currently require the following areas to be serviced: 
- The Serbule Crypt 
- Borghild 
- Eltibule Keep Goblin Dungeon 
- Kur Tower 
- Ilmari Labyrinth 
- Gazluk Keep  
- The Fungal Fortress 

Also, once you have completed The Serbule Crypt or Borghild, you will gain access to the Civil Service Travel Network, which will help you get the job done faster! 

If you choose to accept some or all of these tasks, thank you for your service and good hunting!

quest_45310.Description: Three Bun-Fu Masters have come into the area to help train their fellow bunnies in the ways of the carrot. Visit Master Lopsy in the Serbule Keep garden, Master Flopsy outside of the Kur Mountains Inn and Master Boop outside of the New Prestonbule Cave in Gazluk to complete your training! You think you know Bun-Fu? Show me! [ These quests require you to be in bunny form to advance. A free bunny transformation will be available at all quest NPCs. ]
quest_45310.Name: Event: Bun-Fu Training
quest_45310.PrefaceText: Three Bun-Fu Masters have come into the area to help train their fellow bunnies in the ways of the carrot. Visit Master Lopsy in the Serbule Keep garden, Master Flopsy outside of the Kur Mountains Inn and Master Boop outside of the New Prestonbule Cave in Gazluk to complete your training! You think you know Bun-Fu? Show me! [ These quests require you to be in bunny form to advance. A free bunny transformation will be available at all quest NPCs. ]
quest_45310.SuccessText: You did it! You completed all three tasks! It's safe to say you know the basics of Bun-Fu and are on your way to becoming a great Bun-Fu Master!

quest_45311.Description:
Master Lopsy said, "Hi! Would you be interested in learning the ways of the carrot? I can help you get started!

First off, you need to know how to seek out your carrots. I have placed several Carrots of Power across the landscape here in the Serbule and Serbule Hills areas. Seek out seven of these Carrots of Power and then return to me. Also, you must interact with the Carrots of Power as a rabbit! You cannot become a Bun-Fu Master if you're not a rabbit!

If you need to bunny up, just ask! Good hunting!"
quest_45311.Name: Event: Bun-Fu Training with Lopsy
quest_45311.PrefaceText:
Hi! Would you be interested in learning the ways of the carrot? I can help you get started!

First off, you need to know how to seek out your carrots. I have placed several Carrots of Power across the landscape here in the Serbule and Serbule Hills areas. Seek out seven of these Carrots of Power and then return to me. Also, you must interact with the Carrots of Power as a rabbit! You cannot become a Bun-Fu Master if you're not a rabbit!

If you need to bunny up, just ask! Good hunting!"
quest_45311.SuccessText: Excellent! Could you feel their power? Never forget that feeling! Now take these bunny juices so you can bunny up whenever you need to thump somebody's face in! Make sure you seek out my cousins Flopsy in the Kur Mountains and Boop in Gazluk to complete your training if you feel you are ready for more advanced tactics.

quest_45312.Description:
Master Flopsy said, "Greetings! Ready for advanced Bun-Fu lessons? Great!

In order to survive, you must be able to replenish your carrot supply no matter the conditions! Find a good, fertile plot of ground somewhere out here in the Kur Mountains and grow twelve carrots. Don't forget, you MUST grow these carrots while being a rabbit. If you want to be a non-rabbit gardener, then go talk to someone else! Once you are done, bring them to me for inspection and I shall reward you with some bunny juices."
quest_45312.Name: Event: Bun-Fu Training with Flopsy

quest_45312.SuccessText: Nice gardening work! Those carrots will serve you well! Be sure to vist my other two cousins Lopsy and Boop to complete your training. Here are your bunny juices, as promised.

quest_45313.Description: Master Boop said, "Hi there! Ready for some combat training? Let's get to it! A skilled rabbit should be able to take down any predator without difficulty, no matter big they are or how many there are! Get out there and show me what you got! Take down 20 Mot-Uraks, 20 Polar Bears and 20 Starving Tundra Wolves. Remember that you must complete this task in rabbit form. No cheating! Report back to me when you're done and I'll load you up with some more bunny juices."
quest_45313.Name: Event: Bun-Fu Training with Boop
quest_45313.PrefaceText: Hi there! Ready for some combat training? Let's get to it! A skilled rabbit should be able to take down any predator without difficulty, no matter big they are or how many there are! Get out there and show me what you got! Take down 20 Mot-Uraks, 20 Polar Bears and 20 Starving Tundra Wolves. Remember that you must complete this task in rabbit form. No cheating! Report back to me when you're done and I'll load you up with some more bunny juices.
quest_45313.SuccessText: I can smell their defeat on you...you really booped 'em! Great job! Here's your bunny juices, use them wisely! Also, here's a little something extra in case somebody tries to boop you! If you haven't already, be sure to visit my other two cousins Lopsy and Flopsy to complete your training.

quest_45314.Description: Master Boop said, "I see you checking out my cool blue fur! I'm willing to bet you want to know how I do it too! Well, blue fur is a sign you have true booping power, and you look like you're capable of that. I'll teach you how to have awesome blue fur like me if you bring me a few things. Here's the list and good hunting!" [Remember that you must remain in rabbit form to advance and complete this task!]
quest_45314.Name: Event: Bonus - Feeling Blue
quest_45314.PrefaceText: I see you checking out my cool blue fur! I'm willing to bet you want to know how I do it too! Well, blue fur is a sign you have true booping power, and you look like you're capable of that. I'll teach you how to have awesome blue fur like me if you bring me a few things. Here's the list and good hunting! [Remember that you must remain in rabbit form to advance and complete this task!]
quest_45314.SuccessText: Hey, you got everything! Thanks for your help. Here are the directions to dye your fur blue. Since you brought me plenty of gems, here's a vial of dye to get you started. The carrots? Oh, they don't have anything to do with the dye, I just wanted a snack. Take care, fellow booper!

quest_45320.Description:
The suspicious lemons are back! Suspicious lemons carry several possible buffs, debuffs or items. You will find lemons spawning randomly all over Alharth. Some are hiding while others are sitting out in the open. Now get out there and touch them all!
WARNING FOR FAE CHARACTERS: The suspicious lemons love to deal in death and punishment just as much as buffs and love! Fairy players may want to use extreme caution when touching a lemon! Not everything a lemon gives results in death, but you need to be prepared!
quest_45320.Name: Event: Suspicious Lemons

Objectives.Description: Touch 8 Suspicious Lemons in Serbule Hills
Touch 8 Suspicious Lemons in the Kur Mountains
Touch 8 Suspicious Lemons in Sun Vale
Touch 8 Suspicious Lemons in the Ilmari Desert
Touch 8 Suspicious Lemons in the Fae Realm

quest_45320.PrefaceText:
The suspicious lemons are back! Suspicious lemons carry several possible buffs, debuffs or items. You will find lemons spawning randomly all over Alharth. Some are hiding while others are sitting out in the open. Now get out there and touch them all!
WARNING FOR FAE CHARACTERS: The suspicious lemons love to deal in death and punishment just as much as buffs and love! Fairy players may want to use extreme caution when touching a lemon! Not everything a lemon gives results in death, but you need to be prepared!
quest_45320.SuccessText: You did it! You touched them all! Well done! Now go home and take a bath! You smell a little fruity.

quest_45400.Description: A mysterious talking scapegoat has arrived at the bridge North of Serbule, in search of her missing family. Speak with her to find out what's happened to them.
quest_45400.Name: Event: Lost Scapegoats
quest_45400.PrefaceText: A mysterious talking scapegoat has arrived at the bridge North of Serbule, in search of her missing family. Speak with her to find out what's happened to them.

quest_45401.Description: A concerned scapegoat has shown up at the bridge North of Serbule Keep, in search of something important to her. Search for her lost family, Miss Guided, Miss Take, Miss Fire, Miss Behaved, and Miss Fits, then return to her once you've found them all.
quest_45401.Name: Event: Find the Lost Scapegoats
quest_45401.PrefaceText: Hello! I've been wandering around for a while now, and decided to rest here. You see, I can't seem to find my family anywhere. I've searched everywhere, but no matter how hard I look I can't find them. Will you help me?
quest_45401.SuccessText: Thank you so much! I thought I'd never see any of them again. It fills my heart with joy to hear they're (mostly) all still safe. Here, take this! It's the least I can do for someone who's saved my family.

quest_45402.Description: You've found Miss Guided! But she refuses to return to Miss Chievous until she gathers supplies for a surprise party she wants to throw for Miss Chievous. Help her find some confetti!
quest_45402.Name: Event: Help Miss Guided
quest_45402.PrefaceText: You can see her digging around for something Ah! There it is! She flips through some pages of a book she found Wait.. if these instructions are right, goats can't make it. Of course that wizard would trick me! Hey, you there! Yeah, you with the ears and the hands! You can craft things, right? Take this, and make me a few. I'm trying to throw a surprise party for my sister, but it looks like the wizard who made this recipe doesn't want a goat like me to make it. I'll give you something for your trouble.
quest_45402.SuccessText: These are perfect, thanks! I'm glad you stopped by. I just remembered that Miss Chievous actually hates loud things, so I won't be needing those. Feel free to keep them! And for your help, let me teach you a bit about artistry.

quest_45403.Description: You've found Miss Fire! She's asked that you help her gather some supplies before she returns home.
quest_45403.Name: Event: Help Miss Fire
quest_45403.SuccessText: This should do the trick! Thanks a bunch! I'll be heading back as soon as I finish this recipe. Oh, and before you go, take this. It may help you in the future.

quest_45404.Description: You've found Miss Behaved! She seemed rather hungry when you found her and asked that you make her favorite food dish for her trip home.
quest_45404.Name: Event: Help Miss Behaved
quest_45404.SuccessText: They look alright, I guess. Thanks. You can tell my sister to stop worrying so much about me. I'll be home after I finish this snack. Here, take this. I don't need it anymore. [She drops something, then goes back to chewing on a lemon she had nearby.]

quest_45405.Description: You've found Miss Fits! But she doesn't seem interested in going home until she wins another game. Help by bringing her some red wing tokens so she can buy a game ticket!
quest_45405.Name: Event: Help Miss Fits
quest_45405.SuccessText: That should be enough for another game. Thanks! As promised, here, take this for your trouble. [She hands you something, then starts playing another game.]

quest_45427.Description: The Errana Bunny has challenged you to an egg hunt! Find the blue, yellow and red Errana Eggs scattered throughout Eltibule and Serbule. Once you have found them all, return to The Errana Bunny to collect your prize. IMPORTANT: You must remain in bunny form for the duration of this quest! If you jump out of bunny form for any reason, this quest will fail and you will have to start over!
quest_45427.Name: Event: The Errana Bunny's Egg Hunt
quest_45427.PrefaceText: The Errana Bunny has challenged you to an egg hunt! Find the blue, yellow and red Errana Eggs scattered throughout Eltibule and Serbule. Once you have found them all, return to The Errana Bunny to collect your prize. IMPORTANT: You must remain in bunny form for the duration of this quest! If you jump out of bunny form for any reason, this quest will fail and you will have to start over!
quest_45427.SuccessText: Good job! Here's the dye recipe as promised and a little something extra! [You can find the recipe for this in your crafting recipes under Dye Making]

quest_45450.Description: Raim said, "Hey could I get you to do me a personal favor? I'm really low on supplies and I'm in dire need of string. Lots of string! I promise I'll only ask this of you once - never again! If you can deliver me 50 strings, I'll show you what I use them for!"
quest_45450.Name: Event: Bonus - Raim Needs String
quest_45450.PrefaceText: Hey could I get you to do me a personal favor? I'm really low on supplies and I'm in dire need of string. Lots of string! I promise I'll only ask this of you once - never again! If you can deliver me 50 strings, I'll show you what I use them for!
quest_45450.SuccessText: Yes! String! Thank you so much! Now, what do I use these strings for? Shoelaces! Some elf traded me a pair of their windstep shoes a while back. I have figured out how to upgrade them while keeping their effectiveness. If you have a pair of exceptional quality or better windstep shoes, I can upgrade them for you, if you're willing to toss me some tokens as well for the time. [You have earned 10 favor with Orran the Caravan Leader] [You have unlocked new talk options with Raim]

quest_45451.Description: Moxie said, "Hey could I get you to do me a personal favor? I'm really low on supplies and I'm in dire need of Expert-Quality Metal Slabs. Lots of them! I promise I'll only ask this of you once - never again! If you can deliver me 25 Expert-Quality Metal Slabs, I'll show you what I use them for!"
quest_45451.Name: Event: Bonus - Moxie Needs Metal Slabs
quest_45451.PrefaceText: Hey could I get you to do me a personal favor? I'm really low on supplies and I'm in dire need of Expert-Quality Metal Slabs. Lots of them! I promise I'll only ask this of you once - never again! If you can deliver me 25 Expert-Quality Metal Slabs, I'll show you what I use them for!
quest_45451.SuccessText: AH! The metal I need! Thank you so much! Now, what do I use these slabs for? Clasps and reinforcements for necklaces! I found this Amulet of the Rugged Traveler a while back. Where? Oh, I found it on some dead guy, and he looked pretty rugged when I found him! Anyway, I have figured out how to upgrade them while keeping their effectiveness. If you have an exceptional quality or better Amulet of the Rugged Traveler, I can upgrade it for you, if you're willing to toss me some tokens as well for the time. Speaking of traveling, would you be interested in buying some of my famous flight butter? Go see Orran! [You have earned 10 favor with Orran the Caravan Leader] [You have unlocked new talk options with Moxie]

quest_45452.Description: Riston said, "If you can help me out, I'll make as many rings for you as you want. As a brewer, the Queen has me brew up things to suit her "special needs" when I'm not out here handing out prizes. Could you bring me 20 hops? The time I save from that I can use to make you a ring!"
quest_45452.Name: Riston Needs Hops
quest_45452.PrefaceText: If you can help me out, I'll make as many rings for you as you want. As a brewer, the Queen has me brew up things to suit her "special needs" when I'm not out here handing out prizes. Could you bring me 20 hops? The time I save from that I can use to make you a ring!
quest_45452.SuccessText: Excellent! Gather your base materials and come see me when you're ready for a ring!

quest_45453.Description: Tryaka said, "I could really use some more glass so I can make more of these rings. Bring me some green glass and we can get started on yours!"
quest_45453.Name: Tryaka Needs Glass
quest_45453.PrefaceText: I could really use some more glass so I can make more of these rings. Bring me some green glass and we can get started on yours!
quest_45453.SuccessText: Excellent! Gather your base materials and come see me when you're ready for a ring!

quest_45455.Description:
Welcome to the Writ Challenge!
This one is really pretty easy, just go out and kill stuff like you normally would! You will find special items in loot called a Writ of Unlock or Golden Writ of Unlock. Use the writs to advance your quests and the Community Score. The Writ Master in Serbule will keep tally of the Community Score. The higher the score, the more prizes that get unlocked!
VIPs can contribute extra points to the score just for being here! Visit the Writ Master to see how.
quest_45455.Name: Writ Challenge
quest_45455.PrefaceText:
Welcome to the Writ Challenge!
This one is really pretty easy, just go out and kill stuff like you normally would! You will find special items in loot called a Writ of Unlock or Golden Writ of Unlock. Use the writs to advance your quests and the Community Score. The Writ Master in Serbule will keep tally of the Community Score. The higher the score, the more prizes that get unlocked!
VIPs can contribute extra points to the score just for being here! Visit the Writ Master to see how.
quest_45455.SuccessText:
WOW! You finished all 7 of them? That's pretty impressive! Thank you for your massive contribution!!!

The quests are done, but you can still continue to use normal and Golden Writs to help advance the Community Score.

quest_45456.Description: Do your part for the community score! Collect some writs and use them. IMPORTANT: You will only get loot credit for writs that are looted from the corpse of a defeated enemy. Writs obtained by any other means will not count, but you can still use them to add points to the Community Score.
quest_45456.Name: Writ Challenge: Do Your Part 1/7
quest_45456.PrefaceText: Do your part for the community score! Collect some writs and use them. IMPORTANT: You will only get loot credit for writs that are looted from the corpse of a defeated enemy. Writs obtained by any other means will not count, but you can still use them to add points to the Community Score.
quest_45456.SuccessText: Well done! Enjoy your reward and be proud of your contribution!

quest_45457.Description: Do your part for the community score! Collect some writs and use them. IMPORTANT: You will only get loot credit for writs that are looted from the corpse of a defeated enemy. Writs obtained by any other means will not count, but you can still use them to add points to the Community Score.

Writs obtained by any other means will not count, but you can still use them to add points to the Community Score.
quest_45462.SuccessText: Well done! Enjoy your reward and be proud of your contribution!

quest_45463.Description: VERY NICE! A fine score indeed! Visit the Writ Master in Serbule near the town well to collect your very nice prize!
quest_45463.Name: Writ Challenge: I Got a Golden Writ!
quest_45463.PrefaceText: VERY NICE! A fine score indeed! Visit the Writ Master in Serbule near the town well to collect your very nice prize!

quest_45501.Description: Zhia Lian: If I'm going to be one of those creepy gods with their own cult, I want all the perks! I demand a midnight sacrifice! Atop a mountain! [To qualify as a sacrifice, you need to kill a goat in Gazluk between midnight and 1 am game-time.]
quest_45501.Name: Zhia Lian Event: A Midnight Sacrifice

Objectives.Description: Kill Goat in Gazluk at Midnight

quest_45501.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: If I'm going to be one of those creepy gods with their own cult, I want all the perks! I demand a midnight sacrifice! Atop a mountain! [To qualify as a sacrifice, you need to kill a goat in Gazluk between midnight and 1 am game-time.]
quest_45501.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: I don't really understand why that's supposed to be special. I guess it felt nice when you slew a goat in my name, but it wasn't very whimsical! Next time I see Strekios, I'll ask what the deal is. I guess he doesn't technically have a cult, but his followers are creepy and terrified, so that's close enough.

quest_45502.Description: Zhia Lian: Since you're a spider now, you should care about the fate of your kin, right? I noticed a lot of ghostly spiders pouring out of a collapsed cave in the Ilmari desert. You should help them find peace. Through violence.
quest_45502.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Put Your Fellow Kin To Rest

Objectives.Description: As a Spider, Kill Ghost Spiders in Ilmari

quest_45502.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Since you're a spider now, you should care about the fate of your kin, right? I noticed a lot of ghostly spiders pouring out of a collapsed cave in the Ilmari desert. You should help them find peace. Through violence.
quest_45502.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Apparently those poor sad spiders were used in horrible experiments during some war. Mortals are pretty awful sometimes! But you shouldn't make a habit of doing good deeds as a spider. If you keep behaving as a paragon of spiderdom, Akhisa will notice you. And you're MY follower! You can switch back when you've had enough of all those hairy legs.

quest_45503.Description: Zhia Lian: We need to show everyone that bats are terrifying predators! Let's see, what's the scariest flying thing around right now? I guess it's those Winter Court fairies. Yeah, this will work! Go and drink their blood!
quest_45503.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Bats Drink Winter Fae Blood

Objectives.Description: As a Bat, Use 'Drink Blood' on Winter Court Fae

quest_45503.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: We need to show everyone that bats are terrifying predators! Let's see, what's the scariest flying thing around right now? I guess it's those Winter Court fairies. Yeah, this will work! Go and drink their blood!
quest_45503.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: That might do the trick! Let's watch over the next few months and see if people start talking about how fearsome giant bats are. For now, let's get back to work defeating undead. You can stay a bat if you want! You're so much cuter!

quest_45504.Description: Zhia Lian: There's a swampy place called Povus where necromancers have just let their minions go free! That's dangerous! Hey, I have a special request for this one, can you kill them with swords? Strap lots of swords all over your body, too. Just stick 'em everywhere. I want you to be a horrific ball of swords and death!
quest_45504.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill Ratkin Skeletons With Excessive Swords
quest_45504.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: There's a swampy place called Povus where necromancers have just let their minions go free! That's dangerous! Hey, I have a special request for this one, can you kill them with swords? Strap lots of swords all over your body, too. Just stick 'em everywhere. I want you to be a horrific ball of swords and death!
quest_45504.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Excellent work. You helped me fulfill a very silly prophecy I made a while ago! And you killed some evil skeletons, too, so everybody wins.

quest_45505.Description: Zhia Lian: More powerful spirits have been leaked onto your world. There's a very strong, very sad ghost in Povus. I can hear him shouting into the aether about his bar. You should summon him and then ... unsummon him. You're gonna need assistance for this one! I have no idea how he got so powerful!
quest_45505.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill 'Fangy' Lim
quest_45505.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: More powerful spirits have been leaked onto your world. There's a very strong, very sad ghost in Povus. I can hear him shouting into the aether about his bar. You should summon him and then ... unsummon him. You're gonna need assistance for this one! I have no idea how he got so powerful!
quest_45505.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: Problem taken care of? Great! Took you long enough. Let's move on to something more amusing!

quest_45506.Description: Zhia Lian: Those were tiny-boned skeletons. You should try some BIG skeletons! I found some really impressive skeletal beasts in Povus. Goblins are making them! Go put a stop to it! And maybe bring some friends! These are big!
quest_45506.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Destroy Overgrown Dinosaurs
quest_45506.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: Those were tiny-boned skeletons. You should try some BIG skeletons! I found some really impressive skeletal beasts in Povus. Goblins are making them! Go put a stop to it! And maybe bring some friends! These are big!
quest_45506.SuccessText: Zhia Lian: This is weird... those skeletons you killed were remnants of REALLY old creatures. Older than me, even! What could the goblins have wanted with them?! Well, I guess we won't have to find out now, thanks to you!

quest_45507.Description: The Bat in the Hat: Hello again! Say, it looks like you could use a stylish hat for the season! Zhia Lian and I have been talking a lot recently and she has been teaching me some new tricks. Would you like a cool, stylish hat for the season? Then get me these items and I'll put something together for you. See you soon! Riiii!
quest_45507.Name: Zhia Lian Event: A Hat From a Bat

Objectives.Description: Talk to The Bat in the Hat

quest_45507.PrefaceText: The Bat in the Hat: Hello again! Say, it looks like you could use a stylish hat for the season! Zhia Lian and I have been talking a lot recently and she has been teaching me some new tricks. Would you like a cool, stylish hat for the season? Then get me these items and I'll put something together for you. See you soon! Riiii!
quest_45507.SuccessText: The Bat in the Hat: Excellent! Here's a wonderful, festive hat to enjoy the season! While this hat is stylish, it's not very functional. If you want a version of this hat that is more functional, we'll need to talk some more.

quest_45508.Description: The Bat in the Hat: So you want something a little nicer? I can do that for you! Mind you the item list I need is a bit more demanding, but if you're up to the task, I'll make the hat for you. Take this list and come back to see me once you have everything. See you soon! Riiii! NOTE: The reward item will be a level 85 item. Make sure you have your correct skill combo active when you complete this quest! But also remember, you're dealing with Zhia Lian's magic. Results may be unpredictable!
quest_45508.Name: Zhia Lian Event: A Better Hat From a Bat

Objectives.Description: Talk to The Bat in the Hat

quest_45508.PrefaceText: The Bat in the Hat: So you want something a little nicer? I can do that for you! Mind you the item list I need is a bit more demanding, but if you're up to the task, I'll make the hat for you. Take this list and come back to see me once you have everything. See you soon! Riiii! NOTE: The reward item will be a level 85 item. Make sure you have your correct skill combo active when you complete this quest! But also remember, you're dealing with Zhia Lian's magic. Results may be unpredictable!
quest_45508.SuccessText: The Bat in the Hat: Excellent! Here's a wonderful, festive hat to enjoy the season! While this hat is stylish, it's not very functional. If you want a version of this hat that is more functional, we'll need to talk some more.

quest_45509.Description: Zhia Lian: This next one's embarrassing. For Kajich, I mean! He's the god of fear, but half his monsters are funny, not scary! Kajich saw Tuvillus's heart-shaped jealousy pumps, and tried to one-up his brother with lung-shaped fear pumps. Can you go put these stupid things down before word gets out about how silly they look? But do be careful: they may not look scary, but you should be scared anyway. You'll need friends. The first pair of giant lungs are in Eltibule, deep underground. I see chambers full of magical darkness, and beneath that darkness is a cave. The lungs are in that cave. They're hidden behind an illusory rock, but you should be able to hear the breathing when you get close.
quest_45509.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill the First Evil Lungs
quest_45509.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: This next one's embarrassing. For Kajich, I mean! He's the god of fear, but half his monsters are funny, not scary! Kajich saw Tuvillus's heart-shaped jealousy pumps, and tried to one-up his brother with lung-shaped fear pumps. Can you go put these stupid things down before word gets out about how silly they look? But do be careful: they may not look scary, but you should be scared anyway. You'll need friends. The first pair of giant lungs are in Eltibule, deep underground. I see chambers full of magical darkness, and beneath that darkness is a cave. The lungs are in that cave. They're hidden behind an illusory rock, but you should be able to hear the breathing when you get close.
quest_45509.SuccessText: Thanks. Kajich's a huge ass, and but he tries hard to foster fear. I don't want his reputation ruined by a stupid mistake. Let's go kill the next one!

quest_45510.Description: Zhia Lian: The next pair of giant lungs are in the sewer under Rahu. There's a lot of weird stuff in that sewer! Let's see... you want to go down a bunch of floors. The lungs are near a really big spider.
quest_45510.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill the Second Evil Lungs
quest_45510.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: The next pair of giant lungs are in the sewer under Rahu. There's a lot of weird stuff in that sewer! Let's see... you want to go down a bunch of floors. The lungs are near a really big spider.
quest_45510.SuccessText: Good job. I was thinking about how to fix Kajich's creation for him. Maybe if these lungs had a giant evil ghost skull floating on top? Hmm.... that's too much like Harukita's style. I can do better. Anyway, there's one more pair of lungs for you to kill!

quest_45511.Description: Zhia Lian: The third pair of giant lungs are under Povus. You want to look for a mountain-sized mushroom, and then find a way to go UNDER it. Go deep underground until you hit tunnels full of goblins. The lungs are down there.
quest_45511.Name: Zhia Lian Event: Kill the Third Evil Lungs
quest_45511.PrefaceText: Zhia Lian: The third pair of giant lungs are under Povus. You want to look for a mountain-sized mushroom, and then find a way to go UNDER it. Go deep underground until you hit tunnels full of goblins. The lungs are down there.
quest_45511.SuccessText: Third lungs down! Hey, do you think those lungs would be scarier if they were coughing and gagging blood all the time? Oh, less scary? Hmm. Okay, what if the lungs were coated in fire? Fire makes everything scarier! No? Too dumb? Well, I'll think of something eventually.

quest_45520.Description: Zhia Lian: Ok, so I have this spontaneous urge to collect some Evil Pumpkins! I'm going to get you guys to help me out. Do what your asked of, and I shall give you a small reward. Fail my request and it won't be pretty! I'm not very good at taking no for an answer. Get what I need and take it to my agent in Serbule. I even marked him on the map for you, it's not hard! Good luck! IMPORTANT!: You must at least stay online until the server goal is reached to get full credit. Ortherwise, make sure you login again before the challenge ends if you have to bail early. Check Agent for timer.
quest_45520.Name: Zhia Lian's Whimsical Challenge: Evil Pumpkins

Objectives.Description: Obtain Evil Pumpkin and deliver it to Zhia's Agent before time runs out
